Title: Heavy-duty UAVs and movement restrictions: in Kharkiv Oblast, the occupiers replenish supplies and s...
Description: Detailed information about the situation and enemy losses in the Kharkiv direction informed in Kharkiv OTU. In the area of ​​the Hlyboke settlement, due to the high risk of fire damage during the internal replacement of positions, the enemy limited the movement of personnel. In the Lukyantsiv area, the enemy carried out logistical support for units of the 2nd Motorized Rifle Battalion, 380th Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 47th Tank Division, using UAVs with increased cargo capacity. In the Staritsa area, the enemy is moving personnel in small groups and providing logistical support to units in forward positions. In Vovchansk, with the onset of darkness, the enemy replenished mortar positions with ammunition, delivered medicines and food. Three combat clashes took place during the past day. the Russian occupiers carried out 2 airstrikes using 4 anti-aircraft missiles. 48 kamikaze drone strikes were made. They carried out 320 shellings of positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. Enemy losses over the past day amounted to 73 creatures, of which 27 were irreversible, 44 sanitary. Two occupiers surrendered as prisoners. Also, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 86 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 61 shelters for personnel, 4 ammunition storage places, and 1 fuel and lubricant storage point. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers dig underground passages in Vovchansk and explained why the invaders needed them.

Title: Fortunately, half a ton was found in the Sumy Oblast, another aerial bomb that did not explode
Description: The police of the Sumy region reported this on September 27. In order to eliminate the threat of detonation, police explosive technicians and sappers of the State Emergency Service went to the place where the projectile was discovered. Experts identified the munition as an unexploded 500-kilogram high-explosive aerial bomb used by Russian forces. After inspecting the explosive object, the police together with the rescuers decided to move it to a safe place for destruction by controlled detonation. Law enforcement officers remind citizens about the danger of unexploded ammunition. If you find such, immediately call 102. As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy on the bridge found an unexploded FAB-500 aerial bomb.

Title: Live destruction - operators -Stugny- hit 3 enemy tanks
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on September 27 on the brigade's channel. Our anti-tank gunners managed to hit the occupiers' tank, which was hiding behind the landing. -What was once a formidable weapon now lies on the battlefield as scrap, reminding the enemy of the futility of their efforts. Iron, which no longer poses a threat, becomes a testimony to the superiority and skill of our forces,- the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 1st mechanized battalion of the 66th mechanized brigade named after Prince Mstislav the Brave recorded lesions of the occupiers in forest strips in the East.

Title: The cyber corps of the GUR of the Ministry of Defense attacked more than 800 servers throughout Russ...
Description: reported this on September 27 ArmyTV with reference to sources in the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. As a result of the attack by the cyber corps of the Government of Ukraine, the documents and data stored on the affected servers were completely destroyed. We are talking about the servers of military, administrative and financial institutions that ensure Russian aggression against Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukrainian hackers blocked the work the manufacturer of nuclear weapons of the Russian Federation.

Title: -Black Raven- hovers over the heads of the invaders and burns their heavy equipment
Description: The video of spectacular detonations was published on the Telegram channel of the 93 OMBr -Holodniy Yar-. The released footage shows the -work- of operators of the Black Raven 93 battalion of attack drones of the Kholodny Yar OMbr. Their FPV drones attack and destroy enemy armored personnel carriers, BMPs and armored fighting vehicles. As reported ArmyInform earlier, the pilots of the Black Raven 93 strike UAV battalion of the Kholodny Yar mechanized brigade -charged- an enemy cannon with their drone.

Title: the Russians destroyed the police headquarters in Kryvyi Rih — there are victims
Description: This is notified by the National Police of Ukraine. -Around 9:15, the enemy launched a rocket attack on the district police office, currently it is known that there are casualties as a result of the hit. People may be under the rubble,- the law enforcement officers inform. As a result of the impact, the administrative building was destroyed, and private houses located nearby were damaged. -As of 10:20 a.m., 3 people were injured. There are probably people under the rubble,- the State Emergency Service reported. Police and rescuers are working at the scene, law enforcement officers are documenting and collecting evidence of yet another Russian war crime. As reported ArmyInform earlier, as a result of enemy shelling of the city Izmail in Odesa region, 3 people died, 14 more were injured, including 3 children.   As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: The Russians force the prisoners to confess, like those from -Da Vinci's Wolves-
Description: The rebuttal appeared on September 27 on the battalion channel along with a Russian video of an unidentified man (rather confusingly) admitted to being a Da Vinci Wolves fighter. -The Russians are so angry that we have already taken more than 30 prisoners. They are trying to somehow rehabilitate themselves... We are not aware of any of our soldiers who were captured during the entire war,- said battalion commander Serhiy Filimonov in a statement. If he was shown such a prisoner, Serhii Filimonov promised to exchange him for 5 Russian prisoners. As reported by ArmyInform, the captured Ryazan paratroopers are asking to be exchanged them to -Azovs-.

Title: Defense forces destroyed $1.2 billion of enemy property in Kurshchyna
Description: The video of combat work was released by the Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The crew instantly relayed the coordinates to the fire strike team, and rocket artillery soon reduced the complex to a pile of scrap. The video tells in detail about the joint operation of the -Raid- battalion in cooperation with the integrated detachment of unmanned systems -Bumblebee- of the 78th amphibious assault brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, the drones of the 413th separate battalion of unmanned systems -Raid- of the Forces of Unmanned Systems of the Armed Forces recorded damage of the Buk M3 air defense system, the most modern in the Russian army.

Title: Three people were killed during the shelling of Odeshchyna
Description: This is notified in the Odesa Regional Prosecutor's Office. A pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). According to the investigation, on the night of September 27, the armed forces of the Russian Federation carried out a massive attack by unmanned aerial vehicles on the Danube in Odesa. -Currently, we know about 3 dead and 14 injured, among them three children: two boys aged 3 and 13 and a 14-year-old girl. Information about other victims is being clarified,- the prosecutor's office said. Civilian infrastructure was damaged: private and multi-apartment buildings, commercial buildings, motor vehicles. The survey is ongoing, a complete list of destruction and damage is being established. At the scene of the events, prosecutors work in cooperation with other law enforcement officers, who record the consequences of the shelling. As reported by ArmyInform, the number of casualties as a result of the night enemy air strike on Zaporizhzhia increased to 10.

Title: The new US aid package to Ukraine includes Joint Standoff Weapon cruise bombs
Description: About this stated US President Joe Biden. -To strengthen Ukraine's long-range strike capability, I have decided to provide Ukraine with long-range Joint Standoff Weapon (JSOW) ammunition,- he said. The US President also announced that he had instructed the Department of Defense to repair and provide Ukraine with an additional Patriot battery and hundreds of Patriot and AMRAAM missiles over the next year. There is also talk of expanding the training program for Ukrainian F-16 pilots - 18 more pilots will be trained in the United States next year. -To develop the capabilities of the Ukrainian Air Force, I have directed the Department of Defense to expand the training of Ukrainian F-16 pilots, including by supporting the training of 18 more pilots next year,- Joe Biden said. In addition, the President of the United States announced the measures of the Department of Justice, the Department of Finance and the Secret Service of the United States, which should make it impossible for Russia to circumvent the sanctions imposed on it by using the global network of cryptocurrencies. Earlier, ArmiyaInform reported that The Pentagon revealed details of a new $2.4 billion aid package for Ukraine.

Title: Foreign to the enemy - our drones explode inside Russian tanks and infantry fighting vehicles
Description: Video of the damage appeared on the battalion channel. After two hits, the Magyar pilots were able to stop the Russian tank, but it had to be finally destroyed. Then our FPV drone flew right into the driver's hatch and exploded inside. The tank caught fire. The same thing happened with the enemy BMP. However, there the pilots flew into the landing door. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 414th battalion of unmanned aircraft systems as part of the marines in September have already destroyed 100 Russian guns.

Title: One - Shahed - flew to Romania, and 24 were shot down - Air Force
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The enemy attacked with an Iskander-M/KN-23 ballistic missile from occupied Crimea, two Kh-22 cruise missiles from Tu-22m3 bombers from the Black Sea. Also, the occupiers released 32 -shahedy- across Ukraine (launching area: Primorsko-Akhtarsk - Russian Federation). Anti-aircraft missile forces, mobile fire groups, and electronic warfare units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the enemy's air attack. As a result of anti-aircraft combat, 24 attack UAVs of the -Shahed- type were shot down. One drone entered the airspace of Romania, another enemy UAV was lost in location as a result of countermeasures by the Defense Forces of Ukraine. Anti-aircraft defense worked in Dnipropetrovsk, Mykolaiv and Odesa regions. As reported by ArmyInform, the Air Force of the Armed Forces told the details attacks of -daggers- on Khmelnytskyi.

Title: The enemy attacked Kharkiv Oblast with anti-aircraft missiles, anti-aircraft missiles and UAVs: 8 pe...
Description: informed Oleg Synegubov, chief of the Kharkiv OVA, about the consequences of enemy shelling of the region by the military of the army of the Russian Federation during the past day . Three women and two men were injured as a result of the shelling of the KAB of the city of Kharkiv. Three houses and a car were damaged. Photos of the consequences of the shelling were made public by the State Emergency Service of Ukraine. It was reported there that one of the KABs hit the territory of the private sector in the Kyiv district. 5 people were injured, 2 residential buildings and an outbuilding were damaged. The fire covered 60 square meters. building and 50 sq.m. dry vegetation. The second hit was recorded in the forest strip, where the forest floor was burning on an area of ​​1 hectare. To eliminate the consequences, 5 fire and rescue units of the State Emergency Service were involved. In the Kupyansk district, the village of Kupyansk-Vuzloviy came under several enemy shelling by anti-aircraft guns. A 77-year-old man was injured. Two residential buildings, a cafe, and 4 kiosks were on fire. Photos of the destruction caused by the Russian shelling of Kupyansk-Vuzlovoi were made public by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. Also in Kupyan Oblast, the occupiers shelled the village of Kivsharivka of the Kindrashiv community. As a result of shelling, the school building and fence were damaged. In the Kharkiv district, the enemy shelled the villages of Bezruki and Prudyanka of the Dergachiv community. In Bezruky, a house was damaged as a result of shelling by multiple rocket launchers. In Prudyanka, a fire in a house was caused by the fall of a UAV. In the Malodanyliv community of the Kharkiv district, the forest floor was on fire as a result of the KAB shelling. In Vovchansk, a 74-year-old man was injured as a result of shelling. In the village of Ivashki, Zolochiv community, Bogoduhiv district, a 46-year-old man was injured as a result of tank shelling, and garages were burned. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that as a result of an enemy air attack on Kharkiv four people.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The next meeting - Rammstein - will be held at the level of the leaders of the countries, it will be...
Description: This is reported in messages from the White House after Joe Biden's meeting with President Volodymyr Zelensky. -On October 12, 2024, President Biden will hold a leadership-level meeting of the Contact Group on Defense of Ukraine in Germany, where they will review the progress of these consultations and coordinate with international partners additional assistance to Ukraine,- the message reads. The White House emphasized that President Joe Biden is determined to provide Ukraine with the support it needs to win. As reported by ArmyInform, on September 26 Volodymyr Zelensky during a meeting with Joe Biden in Washington /->told him about the Victory Plan developed by the Ukrainian side. United States of America =traficsource-> announced that they will provide defense assistance to Ukraine in the total amount of $7.9 billion. The first aid package in the amount of $2.4 billion has already been presented.

Title: The hottest place in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions is the General Staff of the Armed Forces ...
Description: This was reported in the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. According to detailed information, yesterday the Russians hit the positions of Ukrainian units and populated areas with five missiles and 71 airstrikes, shooting down 96 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, more than 4,800 attacks were carried out, 224 of them from rocket salvo fire systems. The aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of Atynske, Bilany, Khrapivshchyna, Kozache, Velyka Pisarivka, Kindrativka, Mogrytsia, Iskryskivshchyna, Yastrubyne, Studenok, Khodyne, Yastrubshchyna, Mala Korchakivka, Sukhodil, Svesa of the Sumy region; Kupyansk-Vuzlovy, Petropavlivka, Hlushkivka, Kivsharivka, Kruglyakivka of the Kharkiv region; Nadiya, Serebryanka, Raihorodok, Novomarkove, Druzhba, Kleban-Byk, Petrivka, Bogoyavlenka, Novodonetske, Novoukrainka, Urozhajne of the Donetsk region; Biloghirya, Gulyaipole of Zaporizhzhya Oblast and Kozatske of Kherson Oblast. Yesterday, the aviation and missile forces and artillery of the Defense Forces made four strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy. In the Kharkiv direction, three skirmishes took place near Staritsa, Tykhi and Vovchansk. There were 20 battles on the Kupyansk direction. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Synkivka, Hlushkivka, Lozova, Stelmakhivka, and Kolisnikivka. On the Lyman direction there were 15 combat clashes. The enemy attacked near Grekivka, Nevsky, Novosadovo and Torsky. Four battles were fought on the Northern direction. Our soldiers stopped all the enemy's attempts to break through the defenses in the areas of Bilogorivka, Verkhnokamyansky and Spirn. There were 10 skirmishes on the Kramatorsk direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled assaults by Russian invaders near Minkivka, Hryhorivka and Bila Hora. 18 battles were fought in the Toretsk direction, in particular, near Toretsk, Shcherbinivka and Leonidivka. In the Pokrovsky direction, our defenders repelled 42 enemy assaults in the areas of Zelene Pole, Mykolaivka, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Novogrodivka, Selidove, Marynivka and Krasniy Yar settlements. The greatest concentration of attacks was near Selidovoy and Marynivka. In the Kurakhov direction, the Defense Forces stopped 36 enemy attacks near Tsukuriny, Zhelany Drugo, Georgiivka, Mykolaivka, Paraskoviivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. In the Vremivsk direction, the Russian invaders carried out five offensive operations near Vodyanyi, Katerynivka, and Bogoyavlenka. There were three skirmishes in the Orikhov direction. Ukrainian defenders repelled enemy assaults near Robotyny. In the Dnieper direction, the occupiers were also defeated, twice attacking the defensive lines of our units. In the Gulyajpilsk direction, the situation has not changed much. No signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected in the Volyn and Poliske directions. On the border with Chernihiv and Sumy regions, the enemy actively uses guided aerial bombs and attack UAVs, carries out mortar and artillery attacks on Ukrainian settlements. Russian anti-aircraft missiles are also exploding on the territory of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, where the operation of our troops is ongoing. According to the available information, the enemy carried out 16 airstrikes during the day, using 19 air defense systems. At the same time, our soldiers continue to actively inflict significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupying forces, exhausting the enemy along the entire line of battle. In total, the Russian invaders lost 1,370 people last day. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 21 tanks, 48 ​​armored combat vehicles, 58 artillery systems, two air defense systems, 85 UAVs of operational-tactical level, 58 cars and two units of special equipment of the occupiers. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that The Pentagon revealed the details of a new $2.4 billion aid package for Ukraine.

Title: A new $2.4 billion aid package for Ukraine: the Pentagon revealed the details
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the Pentagon. -This package will provide Ukraine with additional means of air defense, unmanned aircraft systems and ammunition of the air-to-ground class, as well as strengthen Ukraine's defense and industrial base,- the message reads. The new aid package includes: This is the 21st USAI package from the administration of US President Joe Biden. As reported by ArmyInform, USA announced that they will provide defense assistance to Ukraine in the total amount of $7.9 billion. The US Ministry of Defense also announced the provision of additional military aid to Ukraine paket-dopomogy-ukrayini/->in the amount of $375 million.

Title: A rare Russian cannon was destroyed in the Kharkiv region
Description: The hit video was published on the brigade channel. -Hyacinth-S- is the enemy's longest-range 152-mm artillery system. The self-propelled guns were destroyed in the Kupyansk direction. -A rare and valuable catch,- the team commented on the video. As ArmyInform reported, the pilots of the Code 9.2 unit. 92nd Assault Brigade named after Chotyry Tanky Ivan Sirk /->bombed several important targets at once.

Title: The enemy took 2 ships with missiles -Caliber- into the Black Sea
Description: This was notified by the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. There are no enemy ships in the Sea of ​​Azov. In the Mediterranean Sea, 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total volley of up to 16 missiles. During the day, in the interests of the Russian Federation, passage through the Kerch Strait was carried out: to the Black Sea - 6 ships, of which 4 continued their movement in the direction of the Bosphorus Strait; to the Sea of ​​Azov — 2 ships, of which 1 was moving from the Bosphorus Strait. Russia continues to violate the International Convention for the Protection of Life at Sea of ​​1974. (SOLAS) by disabling automatic identification systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the -shopopalo- that is being built next to the Kerch bridge this season will not be finished.

Title: The enemy lost 2 air defense vehicles, 21 tanks and 1,370 soldiers
Description: Loss data were published on the page of the General Staff of the Armed Forces. -In connection with the constant receipt of detailed intelligence data, there was a need to adjust some positions of the enemy's total losses - cruise missiles,- - said the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Enemy losses amounted to: The data is being verified. As reported by ArmyInform, as of the morning of September 26, the Russian invaders lost 1400 units of personnel killed and wounded.

Title: Destruction with surprises - an enemy tank set fire to the field, and a moving truck saluted
Description: The video of combat work appeared on September 27 on the brigade channel. -At first, the FPV pilot -improved- the Russian attack aircraft lost in the field. Then they caught a Katsap tank that was shelling our positions from the landing. True, the knocked-down -box- managed to escape, leaving burning stubble behind... The Ural truck was attacked by the first kamikaze drone from the front, and the second from the side, when the car was already immobilized. How suddenly the fire show began: the burning car, it seems, rolled itself with an explosive -firework-. I drove for a long time (the video is shortened), and what an incredible sight it is! -Every day and every night, soldiers of the Iron Brigade arrange a journey to hell for pig dogs - on foot, in armor, in a car - with a fire guarantee,- the tankers commented on their video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 3rd Tank Iron Brigade showed the combat work of their units.

Title: The President of Ukraine presented the President of the United States with the Victory Plan
Description: This was announced by the President on his channel. -We discussed details to strengthen the Plan, coordinated our positions, views and approaches. Our teams have been instructed to consult on the next steps. We deeply appreciate the fact that Ukraine and America stood side by side from the first moments of the Russian invasion. Your determination is incredibly important for our victory,- said Volodymyr Zelenskyi. The President also met with US Vice President Kamala Harris. -It is very important for us to be completely clear and work in full coordination with the United States. We must end this war, we need a just peace. We must protect our people — Ukrainian families, Ukrainian children — and everyone from Putin's evil. And we are grateful to America for supporting Ukraine all this time,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. As reported by ArmyInform, USA will provide Ukraine defense assistance in the amount of $7.9 billion.

Title: It is not customary for us to avoid -dvizhuhy- — Arkas Commander-in-Chief about the situation west o...
Description: The conversation with the officer was published on September 27 on the brigade page. Recently, the 3rd mechanized battalion -celebrated- a kind of anniversary - two years in this direction. -When we first entered here, it was a completely different war. -Maviks- and FPV were exotic then, and now broadcasts must be conducted 24/7. The enemy does not stand still and is constantly improving, adapting to us, responding to our decisions. We also do not stand still: we change tactics in response. There is no need to treat the enemy as weak and stupid. The battlefield is a chessboard, and you have to think about your moves 10 steps ahead,- says Arkas. He has been in this direction since the very beginning: he was a platoon commander, then a company, now he is a deputy battalion commander. He knows this direction very well — from the firing positions of the platoons to the entire battalion defense area. The understanding of war and combat changes when you rise from an infantryman in a trench to a command post, says the deputy commander. -Everything comes with experience, and experience is a priceless thing. The theory that you did not use or used somewhere on the training ground cannot be compared with the knowledge that is gained in battle. As a commander, I always try to be with the soldiers in positions. The moments when fighters of some units ask how it can be that the commander is personally in positions with his fighters are surprising. And for us, this is the norm,- Arkas shares. In his opinion, when the commander is directly with the soldiers, the soldiers feel better morally, and the commander sees the situation on the battlefield in detail. -In our battalion, platoon and company commanders are on the first and second lines of defense. At least one of the officers of the company or platoon is constantly in position. -All fighters know their commanders by face and regularly see them at ground zero,- notes the deputy commander. According to him, the tactics of the enemy have also changed during this time, and more than once. -Currently, the main task of commanders at all levels is to identify and destroy as many enemy targets as possible, as far as firepower is available, and to secure our infantry. Usually the Russians send a column of 5-10 pieces of equipment: mostly a tank with a trawl goes, then the main column: 2 tanks, an armored personnel carrier, an armored personnel carrier, all with infantry. It is this equipment that we destroy on the far frontiers, even on the approach to our positions,- says Arkas. According to him, there used to be roll after roll of equipment with a difference of an hour, 3-4 assaults per day. Over time, the Russians changed their tactics — they began to use infantry groups themselves without the use of armored vehicles. Later, they began to fly into positions on motorcycles or golf carts, in several groups, and some enemy attacks succeeded due to the effect of surprise. -Over time, we understood exactly what types of attacks there can be, and how to counter them. Thanks to the coordinated work of each unit, in particular drone operators and mortars, we manage to repel heavy enemy assaults,- the officer assures. From the command to the ordinary infantrymen in the trenches, the unit adheres to the principle of proactivity - the enemy must be constantly kept in suspense and put pressure on him. -It is not customary for us to avoid -double talk-. When our infantry sees the enemy, everything flies. Sometimes you have to calm them down there. There would be pistols - the boys would shoot with pistols. I have a fighter on pseudo -Trophy-. My former platoon sergeant. So I often stopped him: -Can you let others shoot too? Calm down a bit.- He will see movement somewhere, immediately -Arkas, let's work out? We need to cheer them up.- Our people themselves understand that if you don't show your teeth, sooner or later you'll be attacked. When the enemy has just climbed out somewhere, -lighted up-, and immediately flies towards him, he is even afraid to go out afterwards. Then you fly around their positions, and they have yellow bottles of urine lying around the trenches, because they are afraid to go to the toilet,- Arkas laughs. According to him, the current war requires round-the-clock inclusion. -I always have a work tablet on in my dugout. I fall asleep under the current and wake up under the current. I hear through a dream that both AGS and LNG are already working. I run into the KSP, and they report to me: -Arkas, they started moving, and we hit them right away.- Then they buried something near 8 occupiers. Then it turned out from the intercepts that this group was supposed to storm us. And they did not even reach the assembly point. Thank God that there are such proactive people who have fire in their eyes and have no mercy for the occupiers,- says the Deputy Commander-in-Chief. He is convinced: people are the main resource in war, it is not the equipment and weapons that fight, people fight. -Almost everything in our country rests on the bright heads of the servicemen themselves. We in the battalion maximize the strengths of each soldier and use their professional skills from civilian life. For example, a brigade is being replenished: we know that a person in civilian life was an electrician or a good car repairer, and in the brigade he took the position of a gunner. Over time, this serviceman moves from infantry and position work to more specialized work: repairing equipment, helping with equipment, etc. We always ask the military what they understand and what exactly they want to do,- says Arkas. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 4th mechanized battalion of the Separate Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytsky destroyed the Russians, who tried to jump into our positions.

Title: The enemy attacked 39 times in the Pokrovsky and 34 times in the Kurakhiv directions — General Staff...
Description: Operational information as of at 22.00 on September 26 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The Russian invaders launched four missile strikes on the territory of Ukraine using six missiles, as well as 57 airstrikes, dropping 66 anti-aircraft missiles. In addition, 729 kamikaze drones were engaged for destruction and more than 3,800 attacks were carried out on the positions of our troops and populated areas. There were three skirmishes in the Kharkiv direction. The defense forces repelled the Russian offensive near Staritsa, Tykhi and Vovchansk. Battles are over. In the Kupyansk direction, the enemy carried out offensive actions near Synkivka, Hlushkivka, Lozova, Stelmakhivka, and Kolisnikivka. Nineteen battles have been completed, one is still ongoing. In the Lyman direction, the Russian invaders stormed the positions of our troops near Grekivka, Nevsky, Novosadovo and Torsky. At this time, all 15 combat encounters have been completed. On the Siverskyi direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled four enemy offensive actions in the districts of Bilogorivka, Verkhnyokamyanskyi, and Spirnyi. In the Kramatorsk direction, 10 battles were fought near Minkivka, Hryhorivka and Bila Hora, where two enemy attacks are currently continuing. There were 17 combat clashes in the Toretsk direction. The Russians stormed the positions of our units near Toretsk, Shcherbynivka, and Leonidovka. Fourteen clashes have been completed, three are still ongoing. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of this day, 39 battles have been fought in the areas of Zelene Pole, Mykolaivka, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Novogrodivka, Selidove, Marynivka, and Krasniy Yar settlements. Defense forces repelled 34 offensive operations, five are still ongoing. Today, 278 occupiers were neutralized in this direction, 116 of them irreversibly. Also destroyed were two enemy guns, four unmanned aerial vehicles, two trench anti-aircraft guns, three cars and two units of motor vehicles. In addition, an armored personnel carrier, four artillery systems, two cars and two motorcycles were damaged. In the Kurakhiv direction, the enemy stormed 34 times near Tsukuriny, Zhelany Drugo, Georgiivka, Mykolaivka, Paraskoviivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. Ukrainian defenders stopped 27 attacks, seven are still in progress. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy made five attempts to dislodge our units from the occupied defense lines near Vodyanyi, Katerynivka, and Bogoyavlenka. Four battles have been completed, one is still ongoing. There were three skirmishes in the Orihiv direction. Russian invaders attacked near Robotyny. In the Dnieper direction, the occupiers were defeated, storming the positions of our troops twice. Defense forces of Ukraine continue the operation in the Kursk region. Enemy aviation does not stop striking with guided air bombs on the territory of Russia. At this moment, we know about 12 airstrikes using 14 air defense systems. In other directions, there are no significant changes. -Today, it is worth celebrating the soldiers of the 3rd Assault Brigade, who are effectively destroying the enemy, causing him heavy losses in manpower and equipment,- - said the message of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, from the beginning of the day pokrovskomu-napryamku/?utm_source=mainnews&utm_medium=article&utm_campaign=traficsource->106 combat clashes took place. The situation remains tense in the Pokrovsky and Kurakhiv directions.

Title: BTR-60M -Khorunzhy-: what is the descendant of the famous armored car capable of with a new -heart- ...
Description: About the relevant decision of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine ArmyInform reported on September 2. The editors asked Andrii Haruk, a well-known arms researcher, doctor of historical sciences, professor of the Department of Humanities at the National Academy of Land Forces named after Hetman Petro Sahaidachny, to share his impressions of this armored vehicle. — Yes, I know that the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has codified (i.e. provided the NATO code) another Ukrainian armored personnel carrier — BTR-60M -Khorunzhy- produced by NVO -Praktyka- (famous, in particular, for its -Kozak- armored vehicles). This machine already has a certain history - it has been known at least since 2021. -Khorunzhiy- is positioned as a modernization of the BTR-60 (which is clearly hinted at by the designation BTR-60M). But I (I'll emphasize right away - I'm familiar with -Khorunzhi- only from the photo) cannot understand WHAT in the BTR-60M remained from the basic BTR-60 (probably BTR-60PB). - On what, Andriy Ivanovich, are your conclusions based? - The body is completely new, with a changed location of the motor-transmission compartment (moved from the aft part of the body to the right front). Thanks to this, the armored personnel carrier got rid of the hereditary defect of the entire family, starting from the BTR-60 and ending with the BTR-90, which is the lack of ergonomics. Now the paratroopers for entering/exiting the vehicle use a convenient ramp, as on Western vehicles and the Ukrainian BTR-4. In addition, the height of the body has also been increased, which also had a positive effect on ergonomics. The paired installation of antique GAZ-49B carburetor engines was replaced by a 210 hp Deutz diesel engine. This entailed a replacement of the transmission, in which a modern six-speed Allison automatic transmission appeared. The BTR-60 could have remained, except for the bridges, but this is also inaccurate. - In the very name of these combat vehicles, it is determined that they are supposed to protect soldiers from threats on the battlefield. What is known about the reservation of this platform? - The armor protection corresponds to the CCSA-4 class, that is, the first level of the STANAG 4569 standard. at a distance of 30 m and more, as well as from fragments of 155-mm shells in the event of an explosion at a distance of at least 100 m. This is not a very high level of protection. But thanks to this, the BTR-60M turned out to be quite light - its equipped weight is 10,800 kg (according to the developer, this is probably the weight of the -bare- chassis, without the combat module). - As far as I know, this machine has been presented to the general public before - In October 2021, the prototype of -Khorunzhoi- was demonstrated in Kyiv at the -Digital Future of the Army- exhibition in the configuration of a command and staff vehicle. A tower with a telescopic antenna mast, similar to the BMP-1KSH tower, was installed on it.   Review of -Khorunzhy- in the KShM variant. Video: Building Tech But already in mid-November, this same prototype (board number -240-) was tested on the test site with the Turkish SARP KPVT combat module, armed with a 14.5-mm KPVT machine gun. The decision, in my opinion, is questionable in view of the relatively low reliability of the KPVT and the lack of auxiliary weapons. There are also SARP Dual modules, which provide for the installation of weapons units (machine guns of caliber 12.7 and 7.62 mm, or a 40-mm automatic grenade launcher and a 7.62-mm machine gun) and are installed on Ukrainian armored vehicles - Kozak-2M1 armored cars or MT-LB transporters. — However, in addition to the exhibition presentations, this machine went through codification and baptism of fire. What do you know about it? - February 18, 2023 -Khorunzhiy- -lighted up- for the first time at the front. The example that got into the short video differs from the first prototype in some details of the body construction, the lack of video cameras of a circular view, etc. It is armed with a hand-operated turret-mounted machine gun and crown-type protection, the same as on many Cossacks. Since then, no information about the combat use of the BTR-60M has been published.

Title: From the Luhansk airport to the battles in Kurshchyna: the story of Stanislav Havrysh, full knight o...
Description: One of the names on the list of awardees is Major Stanislav Gavrish. The officer was awarded the Order of Bohdan Khmelnytskyi, 1st degree. So, now he has become a full cavalier of this high state award. Stanislav is a serviceman of the 80th separate airborne assault brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. A graduate of the military academy in Lviv, later in Odesa. He says that since childhood he dreamed of the army, the service attracted him. Hardened by battles since 2014, in particular for the Luhansk airport. After graduating from the military college, he immediately went to Kharkiv Oblast to the battalion's base camp. Next is the war zone. And already on August 1, 2014, Havrysh and his unit went to Luhansk airport. -The tanks occupied the heights and fired at us from the heights. Morally, everyone could stand. Morally, everyone suffered. Everyone was ready to give their lives in case of need,- recalled he is interviewing in 2021. -On the night of August 2, 2014, there was heavy shelling from Grady.- It was the first night in the zone, we were -baptized-. By morning, ammunition was still being torn apart… We then suffered serious losses in equipment, until the morning we extinguished the fire… Then there was mortar shelling. Didn't understand at first what it was. Saw several flashes from the Luhansk side. Fields with wheat were on fire, the whole land was burned,- the soldier said. Then, in the distant 2014, the military man had to understand and see with his own eyes how treacherous the enemy is. -Entering the villages, we saw the consequences of enemy artillery shelling, the affected families. One woman buried her daughter, granddaughter, great-granddaughter. And I was left alone. Our boys were still helping with the burial,- the officer shared. In 2021, officer Havrysh went to study in the Czech Republic, where our military took courses in combat shooting. Then, along with Ukrainian paratroopers, military personnel from 10 other countries mastered the methods of firing according to NATO standards. All classes were conducted by British instructors. The officer uses all this accumulated experience during the large-scale invasion of the Russians. Works well: in September 2022, while still a captain, Havrysh was awarded the Order of Bohdan Khmelnytsky II degree by Presidential Decree. Now the officer is a participant in the Armed Forces operation in the Kursk region. And on September 16, the soldier became a full knight of the Order of Bohdan Khmelnytskyi. Let us add that the same Decree of the President of Ukraine contains the name of Major Yaroslav Kryklyvy. The officer was awarded the Order of Bohdan Khmelnytskyi, II degree. You can read his story follow this link.

Title: American air defense systems for F-16: defeating Russia according to the Yugoslav scenario
Description: After all, -air-to-ground- weapons are not only -air-to-surface- missiles, but also all aviation munitions used by combat aircraft to hit ground targets. It also includes aerial bombs, air-launched cruise missiles, automatic guns, machine guns and grenade launchers. Attention to this detail in the official message is fully justified, because earlier Politco announced that the United States will provide Ukraine with unique high-precision, medium-range AGM-154 JSOW gliding guided bombs. According to the publication, the range of this weapon, which is capable of hitting enemy targets at a considerable distance, will allow Ukrainian F-16 pilots to stay at a safe distance from the line of combat, beyond the reach of Russian air defense. AGM-154 JSOW strike with a unitary warhead First of all, the AGM-154 JSOW is intended for use against poorly protected targets, such as: lightly armored armored vehicles and trucks, aircraft at base airfields, as well as anti-aircraft missile systems. Although this munition is not an air-to-ground missile and its range is more limited, it is quite sufficient to effectively destroy front-line ammunition and fuel-lubricating depots, hit enemy positions, communication nodes, and manpower. Strike AGM-154 JSOW with a cluster warhead AGM-154 JSOW is capable of hitting targets protected by enemy air defense. This makes it possible to significantly reduce or even eliminate the risk of damage to the aircraft from which this guided aerial bomb is launched. Gliding of the munition is provided by two wings that extend after launch and provide flight at a given distance to the target. When dropped from low altitudes, the AGM-154 JSOW is capable of hitting targets at a distance of up to 22 km. In the case of a high-altitude launch, its flight range can be up to 130 km. The total weight of the ammunition is about 500 kg. It can have both unitary and cluster warheads. Among the advantages of the AGM-154 JSOW should be counted the high accuracy of guidance, especially when it comes to geolocated static targets. Also, the ammunition has an infrared homing head, invulnerable to radio frequency interference. In addition, this glider bomb is inconspicuous to air defenses, so it is practically impossible to shoot it down. This makes the AGM-154 JSOW a highly effective munition capable of keeping Ukrainian F-16s safe, as they will be able to drop them without flying into the range of Russian air defense. The AGM-154 JSOW was used in a number of prominent US and other NATO military operations. Among them: The most famous of these operations is the bombing of Yugoslavia by NATO forces as part of the 78-day Operation Allied Force. At that time, the planes of the North Atlantic Alliance made about 2,300 rocket-bomb attacks on almost a thousand objects on the territory of Serbia and Montenegro. In total, 23,000 missiles and aerial bombs were dropped on Yugoslavia, including about 14,000 aerial bombs with a total weight of 27,000 tons. Among the main targets of the rocket-bombing attacks were Yugoslav air defense targets, which were hit by F-16CG and F-15E Strike Eagle aircraft, including AGM-154 Joint Standoff Weapon glide bombs. The air defense of Yugoslavia failed to effectively counter the bombing and was practically destroyed. Industrial enterprises, oil storage facilities, infrastructure and energy facilities, logistics hubs, including railway and road bridges were also hit. Also, the bombing caused casualties among the civilian population and the destruction of dozens of medical and educational institutions, historical and architectural monuments, and about 40,000 residential buildings. Subsequently, the casualties among the civilian population of Yugoslavia and the destruction of non-military objects during the bombing of the country by NATO forces allowed the Russian Federation to blasphemously justify the war crimes of the Russian military during the large-scale Russian attack on Ukraine. For example, if the NATO countries could bomb Yugoslavia, then the Russian Federation seems to have the right to strike Ukraine with impunity, destroy civilian objects and kill Ukrainian civilians, disregarding any international treaties and conventions, rules and customs of war. The possible provision of AGM-154 JSOW guided air bombs to Ukraine as part of the new US aid package to Ukraine could significantly help the Defense Forces to counter Russian aggression. However, there are a number of factors that can negatively affect the use of AGM-154 JSOW against military targets of the Russian Federation. First of all, it is Russian air defense, significantly more powerful than what Yugoslavia once had. In addition, as a counterpart to the Russian KAB, a guided air bomb, the AGM-154 JSOW is a fairly expensive munition. Depending on the modification, its price is from almost 300 thousand and significantly higher. Considering the price, the number of such AGM-154 JSOW that can be transferred to Ukraine within the limits of the new aid package cannot be significant and commensurate in number with the Russian anti-tank missiles, with which the Russian army regularly strikes Ukrainian territory. Not to mention that the US has a limited number of AGM-154 JSOWs that it can transfer to Ukraine. High-quality high-precision ammunition of Western production may, in general, turn out to be less effective than cheap, low-quality Russian anti-aircraft guns, which will be taken not so much by the accuracy of hits as by the mass of use. Only the practical use of the transferred ammunition will show whether it will be possible to defeat Russian numbers with American quality and deal with Russia -according to the Yugoslav scenario-.

Title: The MOU told how many people use the Armiya+ application and what changes will take place
Description: Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for digitalization issues, told about this on the air of the Yedyny Novyni marathon. -As for military personnel, we launched the Army+ application on August 8. This is a direct and specific application - the digital weapon of our military. -Thanks to Army +, more than 270,000 servicemen can submit electronic reports, which are the first important step in the de-paperization of our army,- she said. Kateryna Chernogorenko reported that updates will appear in the Army + application in the near future. The MOU is currently working on the development of Delta and Reserve+, Army+. -Soon we will present new services in both applications. We've been working hard to get them ready this fall, so stay tuned. There will be many new convenient services both in Reserve + and in Army +,- she emphasized. According to her, online training will soon appear in Army +. -I really believe in this module. I believe that a lot of knowledge, a lot of tips can be obtained from a convenient mobile application. And at the end of September or at the beginning of October, we will launch a new module - an online training module together with our partners, with the General Staff,- she said. Kateryna Chernogorenko noted that the third survey has already started in the Army +. -I consider and call on our military to always pass the survey in Army + and give us the opportunity to move faster in the right direction and make exactly these digital services that our military needs,- she emphasized. We will remind you that this is the third survey that is being conducted in Army+ among the military. Past topics have included using combat systems and online training. As reported by ArmyInform, in Ukraine it is possible to to appearThe unified state register of military personnel.

Title: The state seeks to create an extensive network of military lyceums
Description: This was reported by Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal. He noted that the government is initiating the establishment of a military lyceum in the Mykolaiv region. In particular, the Ministry of Defense has been instructed to consider the possibility of creating an institution on the basis of the Horokhiv branch of the Nadbuz Professional Agrarian Lyceum. -The region has pedagogical personnel for the operation of such an institution, and there is a request from boys and girls for quality patriotic education. Therefore, we will work in this direction,- the head of government noted.

Title: What new services will appear in Reserve+: the answer of the Ministry of Defense
Description: Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine from digitalization issues. -During this year, the most massive product of the Ministry of Defense of all time was launched - this is the Reserve+ mobile application. This is the implementation of our strategy, which was as follows: convenient services from the state for conscripts and military personnel,- she said. Also, Kateryna Chernogorenko spoke about future plans to transform Reserve+ into an online TCC. -Reserve+ expects several highly requested services from our users. These are postponements and online recruiting. Literally very soon, in a few days we will announce the exact date when we will be ready to release these new features,- she stressed. We remind you that the audience of the Rezerv+ application is almost 3.5 million users. The number of officially registered reservists is growing in record time. Title: Germany increased military aid to Ukraine by 400 million euros
Description: About reported the spokesman of the German government, Steffen Gebeshreit. -This will allow for the purchase of additional air defense equipment, tanks, drones, ammunition and spare parts, which will effectively strengthen the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the defense of their country,- the spokesman said. In addition, Germany will provide an additional 170 million euros in the short term to restore Ukraine's energy infrastructure. As reported by ArmyInform, USA announced the provision of defense aid to Ukraine in the total amount of $7.9 billion. At the same time, Great Britain announced its intention to speed up providing Ukraine necessary military support, and the new government intends to exceed its promise to supply 12 AS90 self-propelled artillery units.

Title: A draft law on the Unified State Register of Military Servicemen may appear in Ukraine
Description: This is reported in messages MOU. -The creation of the Unified Register is another step in the digital modernization of our military management system. When the draft law becomes law, we will receive legal tools for working with information about a serviceman and protecting such data. This will allow our military personnel to manage their careers and acquire the necessary education and skills. As a state, we will be able to provide them with administrative and social services in electronic format,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense for Digitalization. The draft law provides: The draft law provides that the register will not contain information about military service, rank or specialty. Sensitive data, the developers suggest, will be stored in protected circuits of other information systems and, if necessary, can be depersonalized using Military ID instead of first and last name. Draft law №12066 on amendments to the Law of Ukraine - On military duty and military service- was developed by a working group headed by Oleksandr Fedienko, which included representatives of the Ministry of Defense, the General Staff, the Security Service of Ukraine, as well as the public and was registered in the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine. As reported by ArmiyaInform, the Ministry of Defense has developed a draft law , which allows Ukrainians of military age to register for military service online using electronic identification. It is planned to allow conscripts to be registered in the military and to specify personal data through electronic identification in the -Electronic cabinet of conscripts, conscripts and reservists- service.

Title: They took 28 prisoners in battle and destroyed the DRG with one shot: the defenders revealed the det...
Description: Their story was published by the commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. Soldiers of the Ground Forces replenish the exchange fund and return the war to the place from where the enemy brought it to Ukraine. Fighters break through enemy positions, conduct dynamic battles and take dozens of prisoners. -I will say that I was shocked at first that we would actually cross the border, I didn't believe it. There were such small skirmishes, skirmishes, but when the tank left, everything stopped. They were scared, they didn't expect that we would actually cross the border,- says the commander of the unit, nicknamed -Storm-. According to him, that is why the Russian military surrendered. -We were given the task of cleaning the village. We had a vehicle, a group of infantry that was walking behind the vehicle. And we gradually began to advance through the village, we knew where their enemy VOP was. The tank went first, followed by the infantry. From the other side, near the VOP, the military began to wave at us,- says the commander of the combat vehicle nicknamed -Perchyk-. He notes that they received the command -before the battle-, but decided to wait a bit and understand what was going on there. Russian soldiers waved their hands, then began to raise their weapons up. -We also raised our arms. It was shown that we are also aiming to end all this uncontrolled without bloodshed. Then their platoon commander approached us. At the joys, we are like this: -Oh, we have two prisoners: the commander, the deputy.- But when we asked if there was anyone else on the guardrail, he said yes, his platoon,- Perchyk says. They ordered the prisoner to start leading his platoon to the Ukrainian positions in small groups. -He took them out, and a total of 28 prisoners came out,- the fighter rejoices. -Storm- recalls how his unit was entrenched between two villages. He was informed that an unknown group was moving without identification marks, but fully manned. -We let them get closer and I see that the DRGshniks, that's why they took the RPG. From the first shot, five immediately scored 200, and there were nine of them,- he notes. According to him, one opponent survived - he ducked into the water, and three had their legs cut off, one more was taken prisoner by Ukrainian fighters. -Let him shout: -We are ours, ours! Boys, brothers, don't shoot.- I say: -Do you have a passport?- And it's all in Russian. He covered the blue ribbons so that they could not see. And he moves towards us with a passport and just climbed up to us behind the bushes, I come out with a gun. His first words were -fuck-. They put him, a Muscovite, Maksym, a stormtrooper, on his knees,- says -Storm-.

Title: Volodymyr Zelenskyi familiarized the members of the US Senate with the Victory Plan
Description: This is stated in the message at sites of the Office of the President. The head of state thanked both parties of the Senate, the administration of the US president and the entire American people for the important military, economic, energy and humanitarian support of Ukraine. -Here, in the US capital, we have many friends who, from the first days of the full-scale invasion, stand side by side with Ukrainians in the struggle for freedom and independence. I thank each member of the Senate for such support,- said the President. According to Volodymyr Zelenskyi, such meetings are especially important right now, when before the start of the heating season, the Russian Federation is intensifying missile attacks on critical infrastructure facilities. Among the topics that the head of state discussed with the members of the US Senate, the most attention was paid to the situation on the front lines, the primary needs of Ukrainian soldiers, joint production of weapons and key areas of further American support. Ukraine's priority is additional air defense systems and missiles for them. A separate focus of the conversation is the strengthening of sanctions pressure on the aggressor state, as well as the use of revenues from frozen Russian assets for the needs of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform, USA announced the provision of defense aid to Ukraine in the total amount of $7.9 billion.

Title: As a result of an enemy air attack on Kharkiv, four people were injured
Description: This was reported by the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office. After the shelling, a 50-year-old woman was taken to the hospital with injuries. Three more people experienced an acute reaction to stress. At least 10 homes and cars were damaged. According to preliminary data, the attack on Kharkiv was carried out by FAB-250 from UMPK. Under the procedural leadership of the Kyiv District Prosecutor's Office of Kharkiv, a pre-trial investigation has been launched into the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine).
