Title: The invaders' nuclear shield: what the Russians are doing on the territory of the Zaporizhzhya NPP
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, reported this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . -The Zaporizhia nuclear power plant is used by the occupiers as a training base for the crews of unmanned aerial vehicles,- he said. The Russians also launch drones from the territory of the NPP to strike Nikopol. — From the territory of the Zaporizhzhya nuclear plant, not far from Nikopol, the enemy is launching attacks on this city from there, using unmanned aerial vehicles, said Vladyslav Voloshyn. The spokesman explained that the occupiers are using Zaporizhzhya NPP as a shield, understanding that the Ukrainian military will not inflict fire damage on them on the territory of the nuclear facility. — There are a lot of Russian servicemen of the Rosguard today at the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power station. Therefore, this object must be freed. The Russian military must leave this nuclear power plant, emphasized the spokesman of the Tavria nuclear power plant. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South, the enemy is raising reserves in order to intensify offensive actions and preparing to storm Ukrainian positions on baggi.

Title: Underground passages in Vovchansk: why are they for the occupiers
Description: The purpose of the tunnels explained on the broadcast of the -Society News- marathon, the spokesman of the Kharkiv OTU Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. — In Vovchansk, in some areas of the city between neighboring houses, where there are basements, the enemy is trying to make tunnel passages in order to covertly carry out the movement of personnel, which is then planned to carry out offensive or assault actions on the positions of the Defense Forces, he said. The spokesman also reported that in some locations in the Kharkiv direction, the enemy has gone on the defensive and is not carrying out active offensive or assault actions. This, however, does not mean that the Russian military has given up its aggressive intentions - they are setting up positions, accumulating forces and preparing to resume offensive actions. -The enemy is improving the fortification equipment of the positions, preparing new positions, strengthening the trenches, setting up new locations for mortar calculations or machine gun positions,- said the soldier. Also, the occupiers remotely, with the help of UAVs, mine the terrain in the possible directions of advancing units of the Defense Forces. At the same time, there is no noticeable accumulation of enemy forces and assets in the Kharkiv direction. The enemy carries out internal rotations and replenishes losses in the standard mode Earlier ArmyInform told who is Russia fighting in the north of Kharkiv Oblast and reported that in Vovchansk, the occupiers resorted to -mole tactics-.

Title: More than 500 million kg of products for the military in less than a month: the first results of the...
Description: This was reported by Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. More than 500 million kg of food products have already been purchased through this system. The first results of the implementation of DOT-Chain were presented by the procurement agency of the Ministry of Defense -State Rear Operator- (DOT). Among those who have registered are suppliers and representatives of military units, in particular, chiefs of food services, management of military units and those responsible for direct receipt of products into the warehouse. Each user has access to a personal account. According to the DOT, almost 73 million eggs and more than 500 million kg of other products have already been ordered for military food through the system. -During the operation of the DOT-Chain system, 250,000 documents have already been processed, including applications and expense invoices. Previously, all this documentation was kept in paper format, which created significant delays and complicated processes. Now, thanks to digitalization, we can quickly process information, which allows us to reduce the time for processing documents by approximately four times,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. ArmyInform previously explained in detail how useful new DOT-Chain system and how to use it.

Title: The invaders' nuclear shield: the invaders are training UAV operators on the territory of the Zapori...
Description: Colonel Vladyslav Voloshyn, the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV, reported this on the air of the national telethon -Yedini Novyni- . -The Zaporizhia nuclear power plant is used by the occupiers as a training base for the crews of unmanned aerial vehicles,- he said. Also, from the territory of the nuclear power plant, the Russians launch drones in order to strike Nikopol. — From the territory of the Zaporizhzhya nuclear plant, not far from Nikopol, the enemy is launching attacks on this city from there, using unmanned aerial vehicles, said Vladyslav Voloshyn. The spokesman explained that the occupiers are using the Zaporizhzhia NPP as a shield, understanding that the Ukrainian military will not inflict fire damage on them on the territory of the nuclear facility. — There are a lot of Russian servicemen of the Rosguard today at the Zaporizhzhia nuclear power station. Therefore, this object must be freed. The Russian military must leave this nuclear power plant, emphasized the spokesman of the Tavria nuclear power plant. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South, the enemy is raising reserves in order to intensify offensive actions and preparing to storm Ukrainian positions on baggi.

Title: Cooperation and improvement of training: the International Conference of Military Medical Schools wa...
Description: This is reported by the command of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. During the event, there was a meeting with the President of the Military Health University (USA) Jonathan Woodson, MD. During the event, the issue of training teachers (trainers) of the Ukrainian Military Medical Academy according to the training programs was discussed: The participants of the event discussed the issue of cooperation between scientific and pedagogical workers of the Ukrainian Military Medical Academy and representatives of the Military Health University (USA). In particular, regarding the improvement (introduction) of training course programs at the Ukrainian Military Medical Academy in the most relevant areas. This applies to courses of professional military education (L-courses) for medical specialists and cooperation of scientific and pedagogical (scientific) workers of Ukraine with representatives of the Military University of Health Care (USA) regarding the exchange of experience in the field of military medicine. -According to the results of the event, we once again thank our partners for their support for understanding the importance of quality training of medical specialists for the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The battlefield dictates new requirements for medical specialists and their training,- the message says. The command of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine hopes that a common vision and efforts will allow each of these initiatives to be implemented in the shortest possible time. As reported by ArmyInform, within the 31st Multinational Military Medical Meeting the commander of the Medical Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Major General of the Medical Service Anatoliy Kazmirchuk and Director of the Department of Health of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine Oksana Suhorukova paid a working visit to the Republic of Poland.

Title: - I will not leave here willingly - pilot Stepan about the service
Description: A conversation with him appeared on September 26 on the brigade channel. Now Stepan is a fighter in the -Taistra- assault drone company of the 10th mountain assault brigade -Edelweiss-. The fighter talked about preparation for service, expectations and first impressions of the brigade, FPV piloting, constant self-improvement and love for his unit. ArmyInform told the story of a locksmith who became a gunsmith and already fired more than a thousand shots.

Title: The Ministry of Defense proposed registering for military service through electronic identification
Description: About this is on the website of the Ministry of Defense. The draft law -On Amendments to the Law of Ukraine -On Military Obligation and Military Service- regarding the specifics of the inclusion of citizens of Ukraine in the military registration of conscripts and their medical examination during their basic general training- was approved at the regular meeting of the Cabinet of Ministers of Ukraine. It is planned to allow conscripts to be registered in the military and to specify personal data through electronic identification in the -Electronic cabinet of conscripts, conscripts and reservists- service. In addition, it is planned to eliminate the commissions for such registration and cancel the medical examination during the registration of citizens for military registration. It is assumed that citizens who obtain higher education will undergo a medical examination before practical classes of basic military training. The provisions regarding the military registration of women who have expressed a desire to undergo basic military service will also be clarified - immediately before being sent to such service, they will be registered for the military registration of conscripts at their request. After completing the basic military service, they will be taken to the military registration of conscripts. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Rustem Umyerov thanked the USA for the new package of military aid to Ukraine.

Title: The first time the Russians went on the attack — unsuccessfully, the second and third — even worse: ...
Description: They published a video of combat work on their channel. -The enemy is attacking our positions - three rounds of equipment have been repulsed. A surviving tank that tried to break through was caught up with an FPV,- the military said. According to them, they also hit two tanks and an armored personnel carrier, stopped traffic, and killed those who wanted to escape. -Efficiency and Profit: Numerical equipment dismantled by drones alone, enemy attacks successfully repulsed!- - say the defenders. As ArmyInform reported, mortars of the Third Separate Assault Brigade demonstrated how they fire at enemy infantry in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: They decided to become spies, and now they can get life imprisonment
Description: About inform September 26 in the Security Service of Ukraine. -Agents acted separately from each other, but focused on one curator from the Russian Federation. One of the figures carried out hostile tasks, pretending to be a former law enforcement officer. In the event of a document check, he showed a fake veteran's ID,- the report said. All the detainees got -on the hook- of the Russian special service through Telegram channels, where they were looking for quick money. In exchange for money, the occupiers sent agents to go around the area and covertly photograph the location of Defense Forces personnel and military equipment. So, for example, in Kyiv and Chernihiv, the invaders were most interested in the deployment locations of the border detachments and control points of the Armed Forces. In Kharkiv, one of the suspects tracked the coordinates of the Ukrainian troops' strongholds, which are involved in the defense of the regional center. -The activity of the enemy group was coordinated by a staff member of the FSB military counterintelligence. His identity and other personal data have already been established by the Security Service,- the SBU said. As a result of the special operation, all three agents were caught red-handed when they were conducting reconnaissance near military facilities. -Investigators of the SBU informed them about the suspicion under part 2 of Art. 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (treason committed under martial law). The perpetrators are in custody. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property,- the SBU reported. As reported by ArmyInform, in Zakarpattia /->detainedan agent of the Russian Federation who set fire to a car of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Red Cross.

Title: The repulse of enemy -rolls- and the visit of the -drone-dragon- to the invaders: a stream from the ...
Description: The third assault unit repulsed three rolls of equipment on its position. For the assault, the Russians brought tanks, armored personnel carriers, BMPs and MT-LB. Our fighters hit the column with drones and disabled part of the armored vehicles. A surviving tank trying to break through was caught up with an FPV drone. Two more tanks and an armored personnel carrier were hit, and the Russians who wanted to escape were eliminated. The occupiers filmed a video of our -drone-dragon- visiting their positions at night. They calmly comment on everything that is happening until the drone burns out their landing. From the video, you can also hear how the Russians, who had thrown around, tried to shoot down the drone, but they were not very successful. These and other topics are discussed by the presenters - junior lieutenant Serhiy Lipko and lieutenant colonel Serhii Misyura.

Title: The second recruiting center of the Ukrainian army opened in Kyiv
Description: -Today we are opening another recruiting center to help people who want to find their place in the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The recruitment campaign is aimed at motivated people who voluntarily want to choose the parts they like best in terms of ideology and concept. This is a unique opportunity to gain experience, gain a profession, and most importantly, to liberate our land from racist invaders and bring peace to Ukraine with our Victory,- said the head of the Kyiv City Military Administration, Colonel General Serhii Popko. Maryna Honda, the deputy head of the KMDA for self-governing powers, noted that the first Kyiv center showed very good results, and therefore the local authorities, together with the Ministry of Defense, decided to open another one. In the recruiting centers of the Ukrainian army, summonses are not distributed, moreover, it is expressly forbidden for the TCC to carry out mobilization activities on the territory of the Central Military District, where the centers are located. -This is where civilian people communicate with the military about what opportunities are available and how it all works, in order for a person to be determined,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Education and Culture on recruiting issues. According to him, this information and consultation center is created in order to suggest what are the vacancies, parts or contract with them directly. Even if there is no contact of any necessary brigade, it will be found in three minutes. -If a person fits the criteria (previous experience, age, state of health), then a questionnaire is conducted - and forward according to the established algorithm, which the General Staff has already modified many times specifically to make the procedure as transparent and controlled as possible. So that everyone who gets involved understands from the beginning what steps need to be taken, what documents to complete, in order to eventually end up in your military unit, where they are waiting for you, in the position that you yourself chose,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets. The authorized MOU also informed that this is already the 39th Ukrainian army recruiting center of this format in Ukraine. More than 18,000 citizens have already used the services of such centers. The first recruiting center of the Ukrainian army in Kyiv was opened on April 30, 2024. During this time, more than 2,800 people turned to him. -The first one was on the right bank, this one on the left. This is done to simplify logistics - not to spend an hour or more on the road. So that people can conveniently come here or call, contact recruiters and not be afraid of anything. You can come or call, at least ten times, if necessary. The experience of the recruiting center on the right bank is absolutely positive. Kyivans and guests of the capital come and are interested. By the way, regardless of where a person is registered or lives, he can turn to any recruiting center for help and advice,- noted Oleksiy Bezhevets. Photo by Vitaly Pavlenko.

Title: Since the beginning of the day, 106 combat clashes have taken place, 26 of them in the Pokrovsky dir...
Description: This is reported in the operational information of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine as of 16 :00 September 26. Today, the settlements of Bachivsk, Bila Bereza, Bobylivka, Sydorivka, Vilna Sloboda, Obody, Bachivsk, Stara Huta, Bilovody, Khotiivka, Leonivka and Vidrodenivske were hit by artillery and mortar attacks. In addition, the Russians carried out airstrikes with anti-aircraft missiles on Atynskyi, Bilany, Khrapivshchyna and Kozachy. Two skirmishes took place in the Kharkiv direction. The enemy stormed the defensive lines of our units near Vovchansk. Since the beginning of the day, 18 battles have been fought in the Kupyansk direction. The enemy carried out offensive actions near Hlushkivka, Kolisnikivka and Stelmakhivka. At this time, five attacks by the occupiers continue. 11 combat clashes took place in the Lyman direction. The enemy stormed near Grekivka, Nevsky, Novosadovo and Torsky. There are currently three enemy attacks underway. In addition, the invaders carried out four airstrikes on Serebryantsa, Nadia and Raigorodek. In the Seversky direction, the Defense Forces stopped four offensive actions of the Russians near Beilohorivka, Spirny, and Verkhnyokamyansky, where one battle is currently underway. The situation is under the control of our troops. There were eight clashes in the Kramatorsk direction. The invaders tried to storm our positions near Minkivka, Hryhorivka and Bila Gora. Two attacks are still ongoing. In the Toretsk direction, the Russians tried to dislodge our units from their positions near Toretsk, Shcherbinivka and Leonidivka. Three engagements completed, four ongoing. In addition, the aggressor's aviation dropped anti-aircraft missiles near Kleban-Byk and Petrivka, and also launched 14 anti-aircraft missiles at Druzhba. In the Pokrovsky direction, the enemy carried out 26 assaults in the areas of Zelene Pole, Mykolaivka, Lysivka, Krutiy Yar, Novogrodivka, Selidove and Marynivka settlements. The defense forces of Ukraine restrained the onslaught of Russian troops and repelled 24 attacks, two battles are ongoing. In the Kurakhiv direction, the invaders attacked 23 times near Tsukuriny, Zhelany Drugo, Georgiivka, Mykolaivka, Paraskoviivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. Eighteen attempts to advance have been repulsed, five are still in progress. In the Vremivsk direction, the enemy stormed our positions near Vodyanyi, Katerynivka and Bogoyavlenka five times. Four battles completed, one still ongoing. In the Gulyaipil direction, there were no combat clashes, but with the involvement of aviation, the invaders fought with NARs in Biloghir and Gulyaipol. Two skirmishes took place in the Orihiv direction. The enemy was conducting an offensive in the Robotyny area. There was no success. In the Dnieper direction, the enemy launched an air strike on Kozatsk, using 10 anti-aircraft missiles. In other areas, the operational situation has not changed significantly. We will remind you that last The loss of Russian invaders was 1,400 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 10 tanks, 44 armored combat vehicles, 71 artillery systems, seven air defense systems, 67 operational-tactical UAVs, four cruise missiles, 105 vehicles, 22 units of the occupiers' special equipment, and two heavy flamethrower systems.

Title: The Ministry of Education and Culture spoke about reforms in the management of state-owned enterpris...
Description: About this informs on September 26, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -During the next two quarters, the Ministry of Defense must significantly strengthen its function as the owner of state-owned enterprises. The economic activity of subordinate companies should be focused not simply on their own interests, but first of all on ensuring the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine,- said Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine Stanislav Hayder. He noted that they simultaneously improve the quality of corporate governance — the Ministry of Defense sees it as an -ecosystem- of state-owned enterprises. According to the Deputy Minister, this -ecosystem- is de facto a pool of enterprises needed by the Ministry of Defense, taking into account the needs of the Armed Forces. This pool will include state-owned companies with activities that are impossible or impractical to outsource. In order to reach the desired state of affairs in this direction, the Ministry of Defense will continue to build up already started processes over the next two quarters: As reported by ArmyInform, in the MOU disclosed details of the restructuring of the procurement model for the Armed Forces with zero tolerance for corruption

Title: -Collective solyanka-: who is Russia fighting in the north of the Kharkiv region
Description: The contingent of the Russian invading army in the north of the Kharkiv region characterized on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon by the spokesman of the Kharkiv OTU - Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. — This is already standard for Russia solyanka, these are ordinary infantry units. All of them are contractors, staffed by various categories. There are former prisoners, there are representatives of other foreign countries, there are ordinary people who were forced or tricked into the army, promising a large social package, high initial payments, he said. This motley crew does not always have proper military training. However, there are exceptions, including former -Wagnerians-. — They also have combat experience, they know and know how to fight. But they also die and are captured. We recently reported that we managed to capture several former Wagnerians, said the spokesman of Kharkiv OTU. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv region, the Russian command is fighting according to -Zhukiv- tactics, throwing their soldiers into combat reconnaissance in the role of decoys to identify the positions and fire systems of units of the Defense Forces. In general from the beginning of the retry offensive in Kharkiv region, the enemy lost more than 16 thousand soldiers is population of the district center.

Title: A foreigner was kidnapped and tortured in order to extort $100,000: a gang of racketeers was led by ...
Description: About this informs September 26 SBU. -The leader of the gang is a citizen of the Russian Federation who has already served a prison term in a Ukrainian prison according to SBU materials. In 2017, the court sentenced him to 5 years in prison for participating in the terrorist group -Vostok-, which fought against the ATO forces,- the report said. After being released, the perpetrators joined a criminal group and continued their criminal activities. According to the investigation, gang members tracked successful entrepreneurs and freelancers, and then demanded money from them under fictitious pretexts. -In case of non-payment of -tribute-, the racketeers kidnapped the victims and brutally tortured them, using various tortures and threats of death. It was documented how the perpetrators kidnapped a Turkish IT specialist who had a residence permit in Ukraine right in the middle of the street,- the SBU said. The perpetrators took him to a garage where a torture chamber had been set up in advance. There, the racketeers began to demand 100,000 US dollars from the foreigner. The victim had to transfer the entire amount from his crypto wallet to the gang leader's electronic account. SBU officers arrested four criminals -in the act-. Firearms, explosives and mobile phones with evidence of criminal activities were seized from them at the scene. So far, those involved have been notified of suspicion under three articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: -The actions of the leader of the gang and one of its members are additionally qualified as a robbery committed by an organized group under martial law. The perpetrators are being held without bail. They face 12 to 15 years of imprisonment with confiscation of property,- the SBU said. As reported by ArmyInform, in Zakarpattia /->detainedan agent of the Russian Federation who set fire to a car of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and the Red Cross.

Title: Captured Ryazan paratroopers ask to exchange them for -Azov-
Description: The video with the captives appeared on September 26 on the unit's channel. Our soldiers provided medical aid to the prisoners, and the Russian paratroopers asked to exchange them for Azov soldiers. -They call themselves the elite of the orc army, and their base is located in the capital of the orc airborne forces in Ryazan. Again. We are not like the inhuman orcs. We are an example of humanity and take care of prisoners,- the unit commented on the video.

Title: Rustem Umerov: The US provides an additional Patriot battery and cruise bombs
Description: Rustem Umyerov wrote about this on September 26 on his Facebook. -This is truly a historic day for Ukraine! The United States announced a new package of military aid in the amount of $7.9 billion. The package includes an additional Patriot air defense battery, interceptors, drones, JSOW cruise bombs, as well as training of Ukrainian F-16 pilots,- the Minister said. According to him, funding is also provided for strengthening the defense and industrial base of Ukraine. -This support will help us protect our land from attacks by Russian terrorists and strengthen the state's defense capabilities. I am grateful to the US administration, Congress, my colleague Lloyd Austin, and the entire American people for their unwavering help and solidarity!- Rustem Umyerov said. As reported by ArmyInform, President Volodymyr Zelensky expressed gratitude To US President Joseph Biden, the US Congress and both parties, Republicans and Democrats, and the entire American people for today's announcement of $7.9 billion in defense aid to Ukraine.

Title: Danube, fog and two-seater kayaks: border guards detained four atmospheric fugitives
Description: About informs the State Border Service of Ukraine. As the agency noted, local residents, aged between 25 and 41, conspired to flee together to Romania. To do this, they bought two two-seater rubber inflatable kayaks in advance in an online store. So that the border guards would not see them, they implemented their plan at night, when a thick fog settled. First, they reached the island of Kislytskyi, and from there they wanted to cross the Danube to the Romanian shore. However, it did not work out, the border guard stood in the way, which detected them with the help of technical means and detained them. Violators were issued protocols under Articles 204-1 of the Criminal Procedure Code -Illegal crossing or attempted illegal crossing of the state border of Ukraine- and 202 of the Criminal Procedure Code -Violation of the border regime-, the decision on which will be made by the court and the head of the border division, respectively. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: Another Russian attack on the city of Chasiv Yar: there are victims
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. He emphasized that Chasiv Yar is under constant shelling, the Russians are trying to raze the city to the ground. -Every day, people who still remain in the city and the community expose themselves to mortal danger. Today, it led to victims again,- Vadym Filashkin said. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday Russian troops attacked Kramatorsk . As a result of the enemy attack, there are casualties.

Title: Call sign -Did-: fights with a children's grenade and does not sleep at the positions for 5 days
Description: Video with Grandfather published by the National Guard of Ukraine. He is already on his third rotation. During this time he managed to become the chief sergeant of the company. -Before the war, I was the director of a children's complex for about 500 people. Volunteered. The war started, he also helped. And they fiddled, fiddled, fiddled. Then I received a summons, there are no questions about it: -hop- and I'm already in your unit,- says the National Guardsman. The attacks on Pokrovsky are brutal. However, with the help of their brothers, they hold on. -They specifically stormed for three days, and then just a little bit at a time. We gave them three days of normal resistance, they understood that they would not pass there. Fire support is generally poor here. -Drones, artillery, mortars will attack them-, - assures Did. However, he admits, constant assaults are exhausting. -I mean, you've been sitting like that for those 5 days, you hardly sleep, because it's impossible to sleep there. It's just as if you close your eyes and sleep, but you're not asleep. You just sit with your eyes closed, but you hear everything. And this is exhaustion of the body. It's like you know you have to get up, but you can't,- the warrior admits. But, the guardsman adds, strength must be found. For family, for children. -I have a small grenade, it was given to me at the beginning, when I went to war. He says that you have a grenade on you, it will help. Such a small, children's grenade, it is always with me. This is a charm. I don't know what helps. But there is a guardian angel - 100%,- he states. ArmyInform has already -rozvidnyk-maksym-pro-boyi-v-toreczku/-> told the vivid story of Maksym, a scout of the 95th airborne assault The Polish Brigade of the Armed Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: Russians attacked a railway station in Sumy Oblast with FPV drones — three people were injured
Description: This was reported on September 26 by the prosecutor's office of the Sumy region. As a result of the enemy attack, three employees of the railway station were injured. Under the procedural guidance of the Shostky District Prosecutor's Office, a pre-trial investigation is being conducted on the fact of violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). As reported by ArmyInform, in Sumy Oblast in September, already 88 enemy air targets were shot down.

Title: The animals were kicked out of the -zoo- — the defense forces forced the Russians to leave the radar
Description: The video of the combat operation was released on September 26 on the brigade's channel. -Zoopark-1m- was neutralized in the eastern direction. After hitting the enemy, the radar tried to drive away, but it caught fire on the way, and the crew had to leave the equipment, which costs about $25 million. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces showed the destruction of enemy radar - Zoo- for $25 million.

Title: Night enemy shelling of Zaporizhzhia: the number of casualties has increased
Description: The State Service of Ukraine for Emergency Situations informs about this on September 26. Among the injured are 6 women, 3 men and a child. -18 residents of the city were saved. Two people remain in the hospital,- the report said. We will remind you that during the day the occupiers ->made424 strikes on Zaporozhye per day. As reported by ArmyInform, from the night strike a child was injured by the Russians in the Zaporozhye housing development.

Title: A crushing victory - Javelin missiles stopped the assault of Russian -motoliga-
Description: The video was published on the battalion channel. Early in the morning, Russian attack aircraft went to our positions on 2 MTLB. Fighters of -Rubizh- struck first the first and then the second -motor league- with the Javelin ATGM. The surviving Russian attack aircraft tried to flee to their positions, but our drones began to attack them. As a result, at least 7 invaders were destroyed. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 3rd Battalion -Svoboda- of the brigade National Guard -Rubizh- caused heavy losses Russians in technology and manpower.

Title: Over 1,200 occupiers and almost 40 BBM: enemy losses in the East
Description: informs OSUV -Khortytsia- on its official Telegram channel -Khortytskyi Wind-. As noted, the Defense Forces continue to inflict losses on the enemy in manpower and equipment. In particular, in this direction, Russian losses per day are: Also, our soldiers destroyed 111 shelters, 16 ammunition depots and the enemy's PMM depot. As reported by ArmyInform, the Defense Forces hit the missile and Russian artillery systems.

Title: Black Zaporizhia declared that they were staying in Ugledar
Description: The video appeared in the afternoon of September 26 on the brigade's channel. -Despite heavy assaults and difficult circumstances, we are in place,- said a brigade fighter who was in position in one of the buildings. The sounds of fighting and shelling were heard throughout the address. Information about the supposed withdrawal of the Defense Forces from Ugledar began to spread massively this morning. As reported by ArmyInform, DRG of the Russian Federation trying to break through in Ugledar.

Title: Sold 230 cars intended for the Armed Forces — a benefactor was detained in Poltava
Description: About this reported on September 26 National Police of Ukraine. According to the investigation, the head of the charity fund set up a scheme to import vehicles as humanitarian aid. Despite the ban on the sale of rubber aid, which he had to hand over to the Armed Forces free of charge, the dealer organized the sale of cars to civilians and military personnel for cash. To do this, he involved several people who searched for buyers, prepared the car for sale and legally prepared the documents related to the sale. In order to hide the criminal activity, one of the participants of the scheme, on the instructions of the head of the charity fund, sent fake reports to the relevant ministry. The policemen detained the head of the fund while he was selling another car that was brought to the territory of Ukraine as humanitarian aid. He is detained in accordance with Article 208 of the Criminal Procedure Code of Ukraine. According to the available data, under this scheme, the participants sold more than 230 cars imported for the needs of the Armed Forces of Ukraine or other military formations under martial law for the amount of more than UAH 35 million. Dilk was declared a suspect under Part 3 of Art. 201-2 (Illegal use for profit of humanitarian aid, charitable donations or free aid) of the Criminal Code of Ukraine. The issue of selecting a preventive measure is being resolved. Investigations are also ongoing to bring to justice all persons involved in the scheme. For the crime committed, the suspect may face imprisonment of up to seven years with deprivation of the right to hold certain positions or engage in certain activities for a period of up to three years and confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, two persons aged 24 and 27 decided to earn a living in an illegal way, in particular, posted ads for the sale of cars on the Internet, although in reality they did not have any.

Title: Do not stand - you will die! The defense forces covered the enemy column
Description: The video of the hit was published on the regiment's channel. -A whole column of the enemy stopped by the side of the road. It is not known what caused the stop: the commander went out to smoke or something broke. But the fact is that a bunch of trucks were concentrated in one point. Our pilots decided to remind the enemy of the basics of military logistics: convoys cannot be stopped halfway, and even better — disperse the equipment. Instead of a two in the diary, the Rashists received a barrage of fire,- the regiment commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 14th regiment of unmanned aviation complexes of the Forces of unmanned systems of the Armed Forces showed a number of strikes on targets in the Russian rear.

Title: In the South, the enemy wants to storm Ukrainian positions on a buggy
Description: This was announced on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- the spokesperson of the OUV - Tavria- Vladyslav Voloshyn. According to Vladyslav Voloshyn, 5 combat clashes took place in the Zaporizhzhia region and 2 in the Dnieper direction — in the area of ​​Robotyny, Novoandriivka and the Dnieper islands near Kherson. The situation is stable, but it can get complicated at any moment. -There is a tendency that the situation in the Zaporizhzhia region will escalate precisely on this part of the demarcation line. According to our intelligence, the enemy is gathering the personnel of assault groups in the Priyutny area and received 25 light buggies from the reserve storage base for road transport in the southern district of the Russian Federation. This indicates that assault actions are being prepared,- said Vladyslav Voloshyn. According to him, the Russians are not hungry for ammunition. The amount of ammunition used remains constant — about two thousand shells. More than 350 FPV drones were used in the past day. -They use all available types of weapons that are in service with Russian units in this region. Including aerial bombs, including missiles. The previous day there was a missile attack using four missiles. Therefore, everything that the Russians have, everything flies here,- said the spokesman of the -Tavria- OUV. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the South the enemy has pulled up reserves and accumulated forces.

Title: The United States will provide defense aid to Ukraine in the amount of $7.9 billion
Description: This is in his message on social networks on September 26. The head of the Ukrainian state is also grateful to them for introducing sanctions against Russia. -On behalf of the Ukrainian people and our brave soldiers on the front lines, I thank our closest ally, the United States, for finding a way to allocate the remaining security assistance to Ukraine and to ensure that the President's mandate does not expire before the end of the fiscal year in the United States,- he said. he. According to him, Ukraine will use this aid in the most effective and transparent way to achieve the main common goal: the victory of Ukraine, a just and lasting peace and transatlantic security. In addition, the head of the Ukrainian state is grateful to the United States for providing the most important means for the protection of Ukrainians. -An additional Patriot air defense battery, other means of air defense and interceptors, drones, long-range missiles and air-to-ground ammunition, as well as funds to strengthen the defense and industrial base of Ukraine,- the President of Ukraine noted. He appreciates the decision to expand programs to train more Ukrainian pilots to fly the F-16, as well as the strong sanctions imposed to further limit Russia's ability to finance its aggression against Ukraine. Volodymyr Zelenskyy noted that Ukraine and the United States remain close allies committed to protecting freedom, human life, and common security in Europe and beyond. -We have always appreciated the strong bipartisan support in the United States and among Americans for Ukraine's just cause of defeating Russian aggression,- the President summarized. As reported by ArmyInform, the US Department of Defense announced the provision of additional military aid to Ukraine -novyj-paket-dopomogy-ukrayini/->in the amount of $375 million.

Title: A resident of Kherson blew himself up on a Russian mini-petal in the middle of the park
Description: This was reported by the Kherson OVA. In one of the parks, a 64-year-old man stepped on a -petal- landmine. As a result of the detonation, he received a blast injury and a fragmentary leg injury. -Ambulance- took the victim to the hospital for medical assistance. Also, OVA told that around 11:30 Russians attacked Kindiyka from a drone. As a result of dropping the explosives, a 53-year-old man received a blast injury and shrapnel wounds to his hands. As reported by ArmyInform, the morning attack on Kherson: two women were seriously injured.

Title: Attack of the Daggers on Khmelnytskyi - details from the Air Force of the Ukrainian Armed Forces
Description: The Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine reported this. According to preliminary data, there were 4 MiG-31K fighter jets in the sky of the Russian Federation. -Information about the places of arrivals or impacts is not public! Thank you for your understanding,- the department said. Also, the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine emphasized that it is necessary to respond quickly to an air alarm signal, especially when there is a threat of using Dagger aeroballistic missiles.

Title: Flutists of the Russian Federation - -Birds of Magyar- - already pierced more than a hundred guns of...
Description: Battalion commander Captain Robert Brovdi reported this on September 26. -These hundred cannons are the cannons that Pokrovsk and Mirnograd were supposed to turn into Bakhmut and Maryinka,- said Robert Brovdi. His fighters also hit a large number of Russian vehicles and armored vehicles. On average, -Birds of Magyar- hit 40-60 targets per day. As reported by ArmyInform, -Birds of Madyar- in August destroyed 778 targets.

Title: The authorities clarified the possible cause of the explosions in Kyiv
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv City Military Administration. Many mass media and the public spread the information about the explosions without any basis, without having any reliable confirmation about their origin. Kyiv authorities emphasized that the air defense system did not work, no missile strikes were recorded in the city. The causes of the loud sound can be various, including physical phenomena such as thunder or the breaking of the sound barrier by an aircraft or a Dagger missile. Specialists still have to find out what was the source of the sound. Residents of the capital were also urged not to panic and to trust only official sources of information, as unconfirmed rumors can contribute to an anxious mood among the population. As reported by ArmyInform, a woman was injured in Kyiv Oblast as a result of falling debris a>.

Title: Zala, Supercam, -Orlan-: how many enemy reconnaissance drones did the flying -Achilles- encounter
Description: Droners released videos and statistics of destroyed enemy targets. Earlier ArmyInform reported that occupiers are improving the system of protection of reconnaissance UAVs, however -Achillesians- have been shooting them down with FPV drones for more than seven months. ArmyInform also informed that in the Vovchan direction, the occupiers increased the number of reconnaissance drone flights, increasing air reconnaissance by about 40%, as compared to the previous period, and explained that destroying long-range enemy reconnaissance UAVs is the key to reducing the number of UAV strikes on Ukrainian cities. In reporting on the achievements of the -Achilles- battalion, ArmyInform previously showed how >long-range -sholomosyajnyj- -Achilles- hit exactly under the tower of the Russian tank and Grad won in Belgorod region, all-seeing -Achilles- saw and eliminated the occupiers in Kharkiv Oblast with the help of Stymphalian birds, and hunter--Achilles- shot a full yagdtash of enemy equipment in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: Winter is near, autumn is already here: are the Defense Forces ready for the cold
Description: The chief of the planning department of the 13th brigade of operational assignment -Charter- told about this on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- - Lieutenant Colonel Anton Baev of the National Guard of Ukraine. — With the change of season, we see that the forest begins to fall and the terrain begins to open up. This is good for us, because we begin to see the enemy where he was not visible. And secondly, it is a risk for our units. But we already went through it at the previous place, where we performed combat missions. We already know this situation, we know how to prepare for it, said the soldier. He said that, first of all, the change of season will affect the nature of the infantrymen's combat work. - The conditions of our area were such that it was a dense forest, our assault groups always noticed that it was difficult to work in the forests, because when we entered the forest, the visibility was no more than 2 meters. Almost blindly, our units advance through the forest, and contacts with the enemy can occur on level ground, - said the soldier. He assured that they started actively preparing for the change of season and weather conditions in the unit at least a month and a half ago. — The brigade went on combat missions for the first time precisely during the winter. We were preparing even before the exit, we calculated everything and prepared well. Therefore, this situation is not critical for us at the moment. Having some experience, we are preparing for this in advance, - emphasized the military man. The officer explained that the planning processes take place in advance, because in no case can one afford to miss the moment, especially in the conditions of war. — Our units are equipped with warm clothes and heating devices. But we understand that no matter how much you put on the front, it is a war, and any position can be destroyed along with all the property that is there, - noted the military man. He also explained the danger of a number of measures to arrange permanent residences and heating in the conditions of hostilities. Common in civilian life, they are unacceptable near the battle line. — For example, we can't put a burgher in the front positions, because it's smoke, it's unmasking. Therefore, it is necessary to purchase additional power supplies, such as EcoFlow, and some small chemicals that help warm hands, feet, and so on, the officer noted. In addition, Anton Baev drew attention to the peculiarities of arranging shelters depending on weather conditions and soil characteristics. — The soil behaves differently, the water level can rise and fall. Some means are needed that will pump water from the positions so as not to sit knee-deep in water, he noted. The -Charter- brigade of the National Guard of Ukraine prepares for all this in advance. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Russian trenches are dug by -disposable slaves- and deliberately and purposefully shoot at their own (she explained why is this the norm for the enemy), and also informed that the occupiers use outdated Soviet armored vehicles, which, however, make a combat unit and change the methods of its protection.

Title: Fiery fool: the man who was -thrown- by curators from the Russian Federation, will receive 10 years ...
Description: This is reported in the Security Service of Ukraine. The Security Service and the National Police detained an arsonist who was carrying out the orders of the Russian special services in Transcarpathia. According to the plan of the enemy, a series of arsons was supposed to destabilize the socio-political situation in the region. According to the case file, the suspect was a 21-year-old immigrant from the Vinnytsia region who was looking for quick earnings. In Telegram, a representative of the special services of the Russian Federation appeared on him and offered money in exchange for cooperation. -According to the instructions of the Rashists, within one day, a young man set fire to an official SUV of the Armed Forces of Ukraine and a car of the Red Cross Society of Ukraine. Expecting to receive a monetary -reward-, the suspect recorded the fire on his phone's camera and sent a video report to the Russian curator. However, the -customer- from Russia refused to pay and promised to -pay off- after carrying out several more arsons,- the SBU said. The law enforcement officers arrested the intruder -red handed- as soon as he set the third car on fire. At the scene of the incident, incendiary devices and a mobile phone with evidence of correspondence with Rashisti were seized from him. Instead of money from the Russian Federation, the detainee received suspicion from the investigators of the Security Service under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Part 2 of Art. 194 (deliberate destruction or damage to property); Part 1 of Art. 114-1 (obstructing the legal activities of the Armed Forces and other military formations in a special period). The figure is in custody. He faces up to 10 years in prison. As already reported ArmiyaInform, the telephone terrorist who scared the SBU, traveled behind bars.

Title: In the Kyiv region, a woman was injured as a result of falling debris
Description: This was reported by the Kyiv Regional Military Administration. It is noted that the woman and her husband were in an apartment at the time of the attack, which was damaged by falling fragments of downed enemy targets. A resident of Kyiv Region received minor wounds. The ambulance refused. Task forces continue their work to identify and eliminate the consequences of the night attack. In addition, in three districts of the region, as a result of the falling debris of downed enemy targets, the forest floor and the grass floor caught fire. The fires are contained. According to the head of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Ukraine Ihor Klymenko, two people were injured in the capital: a man was injured, his child has an acute reaction to stress. As reported by ArmyInform, at night to Kyiv again a mass attack by enemy drones was carried out.

Title: The Russians buried their tank in the ground, and our drones bombed it
Description: The video of the hits appeared on September 26 on the brigade's channel. One of the tanks was standing in the hood and was covered by an overlap, which did not prevent our drones from conducting targeted bombing. In both cases, the pilots made several drops in order not to leave the enemy tanks any chance. As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 63rd mechanized brigade were hit by enemy tanks-saraj, and as well as a combat repair and evacuation vehicle, which tried to take out damaged equipment.

Title: -Mole tactics-: in Kharkiv Oblast, Russians are digging tunnels, mining the area and pulled up -ahma...
Description: Detailed information on the situation and enemy losses in the Kharkiv direction informed in Kharkiv OTU. In the area of ​​the settlement Hlyboke, the enemy carried out remote mining with anti-personnel mines at night with the help of UAVs of the routes of advancing personnel of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. The presence of the enemy's -Akhmat- units was noted in the Lukyantsiv area. In the Staritsa area, the enemy continues to implement engineering equipment of positions, installation of new engineering barriers and logistical support. In Vovchansk, the enemy has intensified aerial reconnaissance with the aim of identifying units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, is carrying out individual movements of personnel to replenish current losses. It was noted that engineering work was carried out on the installation of tunnels by the enemy for covert movement between neighboring houses. Three combat clashes took place during the past day. the Russian occupiers carried out 2 airstrikes using 3 anti-aircraft missiles and 2 missile strikes. 54 kamikaze drone strikes were made. They carried out 356 shelling of the positions of defenders of Ukraine. The defense forces respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses during the past day amounted to 136, of which 52 were irretrievable, sanitary - 84. Also, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 84 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: In addition , in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 47 shelters for enemy personnel, 2 ammunition storage sites and a PMM storage point. Earlier, ArmyInform explained why the Russians transferred to Kharkiv Oblast Akhmat unit and warned that -na-harkivshhyni/->occupiers use mines of a prohibited type in the north of the Kharkiv region.

Title: Short-sighted - the soldier gave rangefinders to the pawnshop, and now he can squat for 15 years
Description: reported this on September 26 the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Eastern Region. The investigation established that the 32-year-old machine gunner stole military property from July to September 2023, namely: three Rangemaster 2800 Leica rangefinders, which he later pawned. In this way, losses in the amount of almost UAH 95,000 were caused to the state. The sanction of the article provides for punishment in the form of deprivation of liberty for a term of up to fifteen years. As reported by ArmyInform, the head of the rear of one of the military units is suspected of -zlovzhyvanni/->unreasonable accrual of combat payments.

Title: The battlefield for life is the hard work of a brigade headquarters
Description: The report on the work of medics was published on September 26 on the brigade's channel. Fracture injuries are the most common type of injuries. Hard, painful, torn, sometimes fatal. The occupiers do not know the line between acceptable and inhumane. Able to bring only grief and trouble, they continue to fight with all possible means of defeat. Evacuation from the battlefield is complicated by shelling and enemy attempts to destroy the evacuation transport. In such conditions, it is possible to save the wounded, who receive proper help from the brigade's medical staff. -This war has been going on for an unbearably long time, but no one has the right to surrender. Especially a doctor. Every living wounded person is a victory. Every day of our defense is a victory,- the brigades say. As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: The border is on fire: the border with a terrorist country is under constant fire
Description: Andriy Demchenko, spokesman, told about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyny- marathon State Border Service of Ukraine. -What our border groups record is that the majority of shelling occurs in the Sumy region. The enemy is also actively shelling Kharkiv Oblast. Well, it is necessary to understand that in the Kharkiv region there are two centers where active combat operations are being conducted - in the direction of the settlement of Liptsi and Vovchansk. There are fewer shellings in Chernihiv Oblast, but they are also present there every day,- said the spokesperson of the State Border Service of Ukraine. The enemy actively uses artillery and unmanned aerial vehicles of the shock type. If we talk about the Sumy region, then aviation is also actively striking here. Although the situation with shelling is heterogeneous in the region itself. -Actually, within those limits where the Armed Forces of Ukraine are conducting a corresponding operation in the direction of the Kursk region, we can even talk about a decrease in the activity of shelling there. But the Sumy region has a border with a terrorist country of more than 500 kilometers, and the enemy continues to strike in other areas,- assured Andriy Demchenko. ArmyInform told, however, that attempts to illegally cross the western border continue, and the number of those willing has definitely decreased over the past month and a half.

Title: Rustem Umyerov thanked the USA for the new package of military aid to Ukraine
Description: Rustem Umyerov wrote about this on September 26 on Facebook. According to the Minister, the package includes artillery shells, ammunition for HIMARS, surface-to-air missiles, armored vehicles and anti-tank weapons. -Together to victory!-, Rustem Umyerov finished his post. Previously ArmyInform in detail told what the new package of American aid consists of.

Title: -Parktronic- for the drone: the occupiers are improving the system of protection of reconnaissance U...
Description: About how the Ukrainian defenders overcome the resistance of the Russians, on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon the deputy commander told Oles Malyarevich of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk of the -Achilles- shock air defense battalion. — Every day, we used some solutions, because the enemy is already putting anti-aircraft missiles on these planes, and rear-view cameras to see what is flying up. This is a very difficult job, which is carried out by our best pilots and technical personnel of the battalion. This is a special mission and they are doing it successfully, he said. The classic -projectile and armor competition- — the confrontation between the means of destruction and protection — has found new manifestations in the -war of drones.- However, the technical solutions of the enemy help him only temporarily. — It happens that we shoot down one or two UAVs every day, and then we cannot do it for three or four days because they invented a solution to counter us. We gather a technical quorum of specialists, decide what needs to be done to beat them in this matter, find these solutions and continue working. This is a constant struggle of technologies, minds, - said the military man. He noted that the main task of Ukrainian drones is to deprive the Russian occupiers of seeing the positions and movements of the units of the Defense Forces on the ground. He also expressed confidence that the soldiers of the Defense Forces always surpass the enemy in terms of knowledge and creativity. - On their part, it must be admitted that there are many intelligent people who, unfortunately, work for destruction, for death, while we work for life. I am sure that our intellectual potential is much higher than that of the enemy, and we will win because of this. Not with quantity, but with quality, with intelligence, - emphasized the officer. The officer said that over the past few days, the drones of the -Achilles- attack UAV battalion shot down 16 enemy reconnaissance UAVs. - We learned to knock them down. After the war, we will tell how it was done, said Oles Malyarevich. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that reconnaissance UAVs of Russians have been shot down by drones for more than seven months.

Title: -Shopopalo-, which is being built next to the Kerch bridge, will not be completed this season.
Description: On September 26, on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novyni- marathon declared the spokesman of the Military - Dmytro Pletenchuk, captain of the 3rd rank of the Naval Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. We are talking about a mysterious building, which the occupiers will have next to the Kerch bridge. Her role is not yet clear. It can be both a hydrotechnical structure and barrier structures. -What it is will be clear when they finish it. And in this season, they most likely won't be able to do it. Because the period of storms is beginning and, accordingly, it will be very difficult to build something in such conditions. It may be a protective structure, it may be some kind of regular transition, but for now it may be a little too early to draw conclusions. In any case, we will see how they will pass in this period, which begins in the fall and ends already in the spring,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. Also, according to the spokesman of the Armed Forces Navy, there are chances that the construction is completely useless - because from time to time the remains of any construction in the sea are washed ashore after another storm. How to -> reported ArmyInform, previously the spokesperson of the Ukrainian Navy answered the question of whether the Kremlin really removed the sailors from the cruiser -Admiral Kuznetsov- and sent them to the front.

Title: Kharkiv Oblast was hit by S-400 and Grom-E1 air defense systems: one person was injured in the regio...
Description: informed Oleg Synegubov, chief of the Kharkiv OVA, about the consequences of enemy shelling of the region by the military of the Russian Federation army during the past day and reported at the Main Office of the National Police of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region In the village of Ivashki As a result of enemy shelling, a person was injured in Zolochiv community of Bogoduhiv district. Also in the community, the village of Duvanka was under fire from the Russian military, private houses and farm buildings were damaged there. In the Kupyan Oblast, the occupiers shelled the village of Prykolotne of the Vilkhuvat community. There, as a result of an airstrike, windows, the roof of a residential building, the roof of a warehouse building were damaged, and grass burned on an area of ​​400 square meters. In the village of Varvarivka of the Vovchan community of the Chuguyiv district, an outhouse burned down as a result of shelling. In the Izyum district, outside the village of Bohuslavka of the Borivsk community, Russian shelling caused a large-scale fire in the ecosystem: coniferous litter burned on an area of ​​15 hectares. The Main Directorate of the National Police of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region reported about the shelling by the Russians of the village Shykivka Boriv community. There, a civil infrastructure object was damaged, grass burned on an area of ​​20 square meters. The policemen informed in detail about the shelling of Kupyansk. The enemy hit the city with barrel artillery, Grad anti-aircraft guns and FPV drones. As a result of a series of shellings, 5 residential buildings, an enterprise building, and a road surface were damaged. Also in the Kupyan Oblast, the village of Novoosynove of the Kurilivska hromad, where a residential building was on fire, and the village of Kindrashivka of the Kindrashivska hromad, where private homes were damaged by enemy fire, were also shelled. In the Kharkiv region, according to the National Police of Ukraine in the Kharkiv region, four multi-apartment buildings and agricultural machinery were damaged by a S-400 anti-aircraft missile attack on the village of Bilashi of the Dergachiv community. In the village of Vasishcheve of the Bezlyudivska community of the Kharkiv district, according to the police, the Grom-E1 rocket damaged the buildings of a private enterprise and two private cars. Earlier, ArmyInform explained, for what purpose the Russian occupation troops continue to rush to Kharkiv.

Description: This is reported by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Also, Russian anti-aircraft missiles explode on the territory of the Kursk region of the Russian Federation, where the operation of our troops continues. According to available information, the enemy carried out 15 air strikes during the day, using 26 guided air bombs. However, Ukrainian soldiers are actively inflicting significant losses in manpower and equipment on the occupiers. They exhaust the combat potential of the enemy along the entire front line and in the rear. Yesterday, aviation and missile troops and artillery of the Defense Forces made 15 strikes on the areas of concentration of personnel and anti-aircraft defenses of the enemy, one strike on air defense means and two strikes on missile and artillery systems. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy tried to break through almost 200 times: nastupy/->The Ukrainian Armed Forces restrained all offensives. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,400 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed 10 tanks, 44 armored combat vehicles, 71 artillery systems, seven air defense systems, 67 operational-tactical UAVs, four cruise missiles, 105 vehicles, 22 units of the occupiers' special equipment, and two heavy flamethrower systems.

Title: The submarine fleet of the Russian Federation increased by one pontoon crossing
Description: The video of the injuries appeared on September 26 on the SSO channel of the ZSU. This time, SSO operators, together with the Security and Defense Forces, destroyed a pontoon crossing, 152-mm MSTA-B and D-20 howitzers, field arsenals and three units of enemy armored vehicles. As reported by ArmyInform, special forces soldiers showed footage of ambushes on Russian fighters in the Kursk region.

Title: Morning attack on Kherson: two women were seriously injured
Description: informs Kherson OVA about this. It is noted that a 20-year-old girl was hit. She received an explosive injury, a contusion and a neck injury. Currently, the victim is in the hospital, where she is receiving the necessary medical assistance. Also, around seven in the morning, the enemy attacked the Dnipro district of Kherson. A 62-year-old woman was injured as a result of the shelling. She has an explosive injury, a contusion and leg injuries. In addition, around 08:40 Russian troops attacked Kherson with UAVs. As a result of dropping explosives from a drone, a 60-year-old man received an explosive injury, shrapnel wounds to the head and torso. The OVA noted that last night Russian aircraft attacked the Kherson community. After the KAB strikes, rescuers unblocked two injured civilians — an 82-year-old man and a 78-year-old woman — from under the rubble. They were diagnosed with explosive injuries, contusions, and the man had shrapnel wounds to the head. After two o'clock in the morning, Belozerka was under enemy attacks. As a result of enemy shelling, a 46-year-old man who was in the yard received an explosive injury and a shrapnel wound to the chest. All victims were taken to hospitals. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the Russian aggression of the previous day, September 25, shhe-14-poraneni/->in Kherson Oblast, two people died, another 14 were injured.

Title: Large-scale air attack on Ukraine: 70 enemy targets were successfully shot down
Description: This was reported by the Air Force of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Also, the occupiers launched 78 Shahed-type attack UAVs over Ukraine (launch areas: Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Orel, Kursk - Russian Federation). Air force, anti-aircraft missile troops, mobile fire groups, and electronic warfare units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine were involved in repelling the enemy's air attack. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, four Kh-59/69 guided air missiles and 66 attack UAVs were shot down. Eight enemy drones were lost by location in several regions of Ukraine (no information about casualties or destruction was received). One returned to Russia, another remains in the airspace of Ukraine, combat work is underway. Air defense worked in Dnipropetrovsk, Kharkiv, Kyiv, Cherkasy, Kirovohrad, Vinnytsia, Khmelnytskyi, Ivano-Frankivsk, Sumy, Poltava, Mykolaiv, Odesa, Kherson, and Kharkiv regions. As reported by ArmyInform, as of the morning of September 26, during the day oprylyudnyv-vtraty-rosiyi/->at the front, the Russian invaders lost 1,400 personnel killed and wounded.

Title: Russia hit Odesa region with a missile - a woman died
Description: This was reported by Oleg Kiper, the head of Odesa OVA. Buildings and cars were also damaged. Dry grass caught fire in the area, rescuers promptly extinguished the fire. -Regarding the drone attack, which the terrorists carried out in the early hours of the morning: there were no deaths or injuries, no significant infrastructure damage was recorded either,- Oleg Kiper noted. Air defense forces worked extremely hard, most of the enemy targets were destroyed. Currently, law enforcement officers are recording the consequences of yet another crime committed by the Russians against the civilian population of Odesa. As reported by ArmyInform, as a result of the Russian aggression of the previous day, September 25, shhe-14-poraneni/->in Kherson Oblast, two people died, 14 more were injured.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: The past day in the Kherson region took the lives of two residents, and another 14 were injured
Description: This is informs the head of the Kherson State Administration Oleksandr Prokudin. Antonivka, Prydniprovske, Bilozerka, Komyshany, Stanislav, Sadove, Muzikyvka, Naddnipryanske, Zimivnyk, Tomyna Balka, Shiroka Balka, Inzhenerne, Tokarivka, Novodmytrivka, Beryslav, Monastyrske, Shlyakhove, Mykhailivka, Zolota Balka, Velika came under enemy fire and airstrikes last day. Oleksandrivka, Havriilvka, Tomarine, Odradokamyanka and the city of Kherson. Title: Ammunition for HIMARS and artillery shells: the US announced a new aid package for Ukraine
Description: This is stated in the message at websites of the Pentagon. The new package included air-to-ground weapons, ammunition for missile systems and artillery, armored vehicles and anti-tank weapons. The aid package from the US includes: This is already the 66th tranche of equipment that the Administration of President Joe Biden will provide to Ukraine from the warehouses of the US Department of Defense, starting in August 2021. -The United States will continue to work with about 50 NATO members and partners through the Defense Contact Group of Ukraine and related coalitions of forces and assets to provide Ukraine with the support it needs to win the war,- the Pentagon emphasized. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine offered Northern European states were offered to join the -Northern Brigade- project. Title: 424 strikes on Zaporizhzhia per day: the number of victims as a result of the night attack has incre...
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of the Zaporizhzhya OVA. According to him, two wounded during the night enemy shelling are in the hospital. Title: More than 30 countries and the EU signed the Joint Declaration on the Restoration of Ukraine
Description: About this informs Office of the President of Ukraine. During the adoption of the Joint Declaration, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi, the President of the United States Joseph Biden, the President of the European Commission Ursula von der Leyen, the Prime Minister of Great Britain Keir Starmer, the Chairman of the Council of Ministers of Italy George Maloney and the Prime Minister of Canada Justin Trudeau spoke. Joseph Biden emphasized that this declaration is being made public to demonstrate support for Ukraine now and in the future. -I am determined to ensure that Ukraine has what it needs to win and fight for its survival. Tomorrow, I will announce a series of actions to accelerate support for the Ukrainian military,- the US President said. He also emphasized that partner countries will help Ukraine move from economic stability to economic revival. According to Joseph Biden, revenues from frozen Russian assets will be used to rebuild the country. Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted that this joint commitment will contribute to the restoration of Ukraine. It provides for the coordination of relevant efforts through the Ukrainian platform of donors. The President emphasized that this support should become tangible already this year. -This shows our shared view of life - we protect people, and we provide people with the opportunity to live. And it is absolutely justified that those who help us survive now will be the first — together with Ukraine — to benefit from large-scale reconstruction,- he emphasized. The main points of the declaration: comprehensive support for the reconstruction of Ukraine on its way to EU membership, coordination of support through the Ukrainian donor platform, provision of additional financial support in the amount of about 50 billion dollars by the end of the year. the United States through revenues from frozen Russian assets, part of which will be directed to defense needs. The signatories clearly stated that through their collective support for Ukrainian reconstruction and recovery, they would ensure that Russia could not achieve its goals, and would also do everything possible to ensure that, after the war, Ukraine had an economy resilient to Russian threats. The joint declaration is open for signature. As reported by ArmyInform, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyi met with the President of France Emmanuel Macron and volodymyra-zelenskogo-ta-emmanyuelya-makrona/->thanked France for its strong support for Ukraine's membership in NATO and EU, as well as for military aid.

Title: Destroy the enemy's artillery: the expert revealed the secret of the success of the Defense Forces o...
Description: Military expert Petro Chernyk told ArmyInform why this was achieved and how much enemy artillery still needs to be destroyed in order to deprive Russia of the possibility of using these weapons against Ukraine. It is no secret that in order to suppress and destroy the artillery of the Russian occupiers, the Ukrainian defenders are conducting a counter-battery fight on different areas of the front. — First of all, there are a few very important questions about the artillery that need to be cleared up. Despite the fact that drones enter the great war as a very serious striking force, no one will ever replace artillery on the battlefield. Why? Of course, the drone is very good, it is a high-precision and high-quality weapon. But the drone can carry 2, 3, well, a maximum of 5 kg of explosives. Instead, 152-mm or 155-mm artillery ammunition is within 50 kg of the iron itself plus 5-7 kg of explosives, Petro Chernyk emphasizes. Another key point. Ammunition shrapnel is the primary impact force. After all, artillery ammunition can scatter them at great speed over large areas, that is, it is a much more powerful and serious striking force than a drone. Artillery therefore remains paramount in this war. At the moment, despite the use of even drones, at least 80% of the war takes place with the help of artillery. So far, the Defense Forces have set absolute records for the destruction of enemy artillery. More than 18,000 Russian artillery units were affected. That's a fantastic amount. At the beginning of this war, especially until the spring of 2023, 90% of the hits in counter-battery duels were actually done by artillery. That is, cannon on cannon. Why did we manage to work so well? Ukrainian gunners have modern means for accurate detection of enemy artillery. These are, in particular, counter-battery radars, which were provided by our partner countries as part of military assistance to counter Russian aggression. The German COBRA radar system is very effective in detecting enemy artillery. It is considered one of the world's best ground-based weapon detection systems. With a declared detection range of up to 100 km, COBRA is capable of detecting and classifying up to 40 units of artillery systems in two minutes. Plus, the American counter-battery system AN/TPQ-36 at a distance of up to 24 km can count up to 20 units of artillery barrels. And at close distances of 4-5 km, the AN/TPQ-48 and 50 systems are already operating. To defeat enemy armored vehicles, our artillery actively and extremely effectively uses -smart munitions- such as SMArt 155 and BONUS, which contain homing subelements. Let's not forget the M982 Excalibur guided munitions. In the spring of 2023, the mass use of FPV drones began. Precisely for the destruction of enemy artillery installations. — Our gunners have learned to calculate the location of the enemy's artillery installations very well. By the way, again thanks to these counter-battery systems. They were able to accurately direct FPV drones. Therefore, we have a phenomenal result for the summer of this year. More than 4,500 artillery installations of the Rosarmy were affected. If you divide this indicator by the number 72 (for example, the regular artillery brigade of the enemy is 72 artillery units. - Ed.), then more than 60 enemy artillery brigades were destroyed (damaged). But there are several nuances. Because quite understandable questions arise, why does Russia have such huge reserves in terms of artillery supply? And what is their margin of safety? At the beginning of the invasion, the regular complex of the Russian Federation had approximately 5,400 barrels and more than 10,000 in storage. Plus up to 5 thousand mortars. Currently, according to the General Staff of the Armed Forces, more than 18,000 enemy artillery systems have been destroyed. But there is a certain pitfall, I would say, in terms of calculation. It's not a bug, it's just that accounting is very complicated. — Let's take a look at the D-20 installation as an example. It is a heavy gun, has a large armor plate, and is on rubber wheels. A drone flies into it with a 2-3 kilogram explosive. A cannon is considered hit even if the wheels are burned and the sight is broken. But often after the explosion, the barrel, breech and recoil remain intact. How to count then? Is it already a decommissioned barrel or not? No, not written off, explains Petro Chernyk. Losses are not 100% destruction of artillery systems. In most cases, these are damages that only put the unit out of combat condition for a while, while keeping it repairable. - Then the Russians took the cannon to the factory, repaired it and returned it to the battle. That is, it is necessary to take into account the reverse cycle of equipment repair. It is simply impossible to calculate how many art barrels actually survived the repair. Therefore, in my opinion, 18 thousand destroyed artillery systems of the Russian Federation is not their absolute destruction. To be fair, it's an injury. It is a completely different thing when an Excalibur munition flies precisely on enemy equipment, and nothing is left of the installation. Then, of course, we can talk about the absolute destruction of technology. — Here lies the philosophy of answering the question, what is the enemy's margin of safety. And it is extremely difficult to give an exact answer, how much more needs to be hit, plus 6 or 7 thousand artillery installations, in order to completely deprive Russia of the possibility of using artillery on the battlefield, the military expert claims. It should not be forgotten that the Soviet Union produced a huge number of samples of a wide variety of artillery and delivered them, in particular, to so-called friendly countries. Russia is conducting targeted work to return artillery systems from African countries to ensure its own needs in the war against Ukraine. The Chinese are very covertly, in small numbers, but also provide the Russians with these weapons. Plus help to the Russian Federation from North Korea.
