Title: Overwhelm -Orlana-: how we manage to destroy Russian UAVs
Description: Military expert Petro Chernyk answered this question. — The enemy has now begun to lose many more unmanned aerial systems, especially high-altitude ones, which fly at an altitude of several kilometers. First of all, it is about their most massive reconnaissance unmanned complex -Orlan-10-, the expert notes. And he adds that a really breakthrough moment happened in the middle of this summer: - Our radio electronic struggle increased by an order of magnitude. The phenomenon consists in the fact that we managed not only to increase the production of the required amount (of REB means - Ed.), but also to greatly reduce its cost. The breakthrough did happen. And the state should be thanked for the fact that, by law, a number of restrictions were removed from the components that come to Ukraine. The second reason for the increase in the enemy's losses of operational-tactical UAVs is the improvement of the operation of portable anti-aircraft missile systems of various classes and types. — These are the same FIM-92 Stinger or excellent RBS-70 complexes, which have proven themselves very well… And we should mention one more unique thing - kamikaze drones: we have learned to use them to climb to great heights to enemy UAVs and destroy them, says a military expert. And he concludes that the three components he listed are what allowed our Defense Forces to raise the enemy UAV destruction rate so high. But Petro Chernyk advises not to be enchanted: — Because in the area of ​​radio-electronic warfare, the enemy has the second school in the world. He also knows how to work with REEs. And microelectronics can be obtained on world markets. He learns and learns quite quickly… At the same time, the expert notes that the level of destruction by our Defense Forces of such a number of operational-tactical level enemy UAVs is a truly unique phenomenon that has not yet occurred in this war. — If I had been told a year ago that it would be possible to approach the Orlan-10 with the help of another drone, and a smaller one, it would have only made me smile.

Title: 29 months of captivity. The history of the struggle, capture and return of the Hero of Ukraine Vikto...
Description: During the battles for surrounded Mariupol, on April 11, 2022, Viktor Ivchuk was awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine by the Decree of President Volodymyr Zelenskyi. And the very next day, April 12, Ivchuk was captured by the Russian Federation. The story of the officer's combat journey and resilience, 29 months of captivity and his return home is in the ArmyInform material. A military man originally from Vinnytsia. Studied at Mykola Pirogov Vinnytsia National Medical University. 2014 year. An officer in the 95th separate airborne assault brigade of the Armed Forces participated in battles in the east of our country. At that time, he was the head of the medical service. The fighting was heavy and intense, so Ivchuk, together with his comrades, provided first aid to wounded soldiers and civilians, and carried out their evacuation. On July 27, 2014, during the assault on the Savur Tomb, the officer received a shrapnel gunshot wound to the right hand. But, despite this, he organized a real special operation, thanks to which it was possible to evacuate 60 wounded from the battlefield. For this, Ivchuk was awarded the Order of Bohdan Khmelnytsky III degree. For several years, he held the post of deputy head of the military hospital in Dnipro, while simultaneously studying for a master's degree at the Ukrainian Military Medical Academy. A month before the beginning of the full-scale invasion of the Russian Federation, Colonel Ivchuk was transferred from Kyiv to Mariupol and appointed to the position of commander of the 555th military hospital. The hospital continued its work even after February 24, 2022, despite constant shelling by Russian troops. Until March 16, when the last building of the institution was destroyed by bombing at the same time as the Mariupol Drama Theater, where hundreds of civilians were hiding. Thanks to the efforts of hospital doctors, hundreds of lives of the defenders of Mariupol and its residents were saved. They worked despite everything, although operations had to be carried out under fire, in basements, in helmets and body armor. In March 2022, a bomb hit the hospital - the facility was targeted by the enemy. All the medical personnel, together with the wounded, divided into two groups. The first one was to join the Ukrainian military at Azovstal. The other, including Commander Viktor Ivchuk, went to the Ilyich metallurgical plant. On April 11, 2022, the head of the Mariupol military hospital, colonel of the medical service, Viktor Ivchuk, was awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine with the award of the -Golden Star- order. -On April 11, 2022, by the decree of President Volodymyr Zelensky, my husband was awarded the title of Hero of Ukraine. In the morning, I received telephone greetings, and I knew nothing about the decree - it was not at all before that. The next day I received a message from an unknown number: -We are being taken prisoner.- I had a mixed feeling. On the one hand, she was happy that her husband was still alive, albeit in captivity. At that time, no one even imagined what Russian captivity was. On the other hand, it was very infuriating that the occupiers, contrary to the norms of international humanitarian law and the Geneva Convention on the Treatment of Prisoners of War, forcibly deprived the doctors of their freedom. They should have let them go! But no. They said they would trade them for their military,- recalls Victoria Ivchuk. The wife remembers the last phone conversation with her husband at the beginning of April 22nd - he was saying goodbye to her and her son. What followed were 29 long months of enemy captivity. According to his wife (and she was told this by military men who had been released from captivity earlier), the leadership of the colony in Olenivka allowed our medics, including Viktor, to treat and care for the wounded, whom they took out of Mariupol. But when the terrorist attack happened, they were not allowed to join the victims. People were burning alive, but no one was saving them. And a year after that tragedy in Olenivka, his wife Viktoria received a letter with a stamp of the Russian post office on the envelope. In the envelope was a piece of paper with a few lines: -I'm fine.- She recognized Victor's handwriting. But there was no date in the letter - it was difficult to understand when it was written. As it turned out later, shortly after the prisoners were taken from Olenivka to Stary Oskol, the colony distributed to everyone the same pieces of paper with the identical text: -Everything is fine with me.- Victoria, together with the families of captured and missing doctors, created the public organization -Military Doctors of Ukraine-, which included relatives of prisoners from Kherson region, Donetsk region, and Kharkiv region. Together, they gathered all the information related to the prisoners, which was transmitted by the relevant authorities. The NGO cooperates with governmental, human rights and public organizations. Has its own site. In June of this year, Victoria and other women, whose relatives defended Mariupol and are illegally held in Russian torture camps, had an audience with the Pope and asked him to facilitate the release of Ukrainian prisoners of war. During the meeting, Victoria Ivchuk presented the pontiff with a symbolic medical gown with photos of captured doctors. The officer returned to Ukraine after the exchange on September 13, 2024. His son, wife, parents and brother were waiting for him. Photos from Victoria Ivchuk's personal archive and from open sources

Title: Wounded in battle: about payments to defenders during treatment
Description: ArmyInform explains when and what wounded defenders can receive and why payments may stop. By the way, currently all social guarantees also apply to those military personnel who perform combat missions outside Ukraine - on the territory of the aggressor state. In the event of injury to a military serviceman, the payment of financial support for the last position held for the entire period of treatment is preserved. Currently it can continue not more than 12 consecutive months. Here we are talking about the time a military man spends in hospitals or hospitals, as well as medical leave. This usually takes several months. If there is a need for longer treatment, then no later than 4 months after the start of treatment, you need to undergo VLC. It is on the basis of this decision that the payment of financial support should continue in the future. Tip: During the entire period of treatment or medical leave, stay in touch with your immediate commander and report any changes. Our own experience shows that this prevents payment problems. This payment is included in the list of additional rewards. In the army, it is better known as -combat-. She is also a wounded soldier assigned. But there are certain nuances. When is it paid? Now about the nuances. The basis for this payment is a certificate about the circumstances of the injury (injury, contusion, mutilation), so-called form 5. It must be provided in a military unit. And it must be stated that the injury is related to the defense of the Motherland. If there is no such wording in the certificate, then the money will most likely not be credited. The certificate must also state that the serviceman was wearing personal protective equipment, did not commit a criminal offense, did not attempt to injure himself, and was not under the influence of alcohol or drugs. All the listed items are grounds for refusing to pay additional compensation. One more nuance. After discharge from the hospital, the -combat- 100,000 should continue to be paid only if you are sent on leave for treatment due to a serious injury. This should be spelled out in the conclusion of the VLK. If the injury is not serious, then the payment of 100,000 is stopped. It is also worth remembering that this additional reward is calculated in proportion to the number of days. That is, as well as -combat- (for example, if you were in the hospital for 20 days, then the additional reward will be approximately 65 thousand hryvnias). If additional reward after wounding is not paid, then a report should be written in the name of the commander for inclusion in the order for payment of additional reward and a copy of the certificate of wounding should be attached to this report. If the payment is refused, and you consider it illegal, you can contact the hotline of the Ministry of Defense or lawyers. Case law shows that, as a rule, military personnel are still credited with all guaranteed benefits, if there are grounds for this. Wounding of servicemen is one of the grounds for the payment of material assistance for solving social and household issues. This is defined by decision of the Minister of Defense dated September 16 January 2024. Such assistance may be paid once a year in the amount of a monthly allowance. More about how to get this help can be read here. If the injury resulted in disability or partial loss of working capacity, in this case you can also count on one-time cash assistance. Its size depends on the established disability group and the subsistence minimum for able-bodied persons, which is revised every year. If the disability occurred as a result of an injury during the performance of military service duties, then the following payment amounts have been established in 2024: One-time assistance is provided not only in the event of injury during the performance of military service duties, but also , who received a disability during military service as a result of illness or injury. The amount of the benefit also depends on the set disability group: A one-time benefit is provided in case of partial disability. The Medical and Social Expert Commission (MSEK) must establish the degree of disability in percentage. The amount of payment will depend on the established degree. For servicemen who are partially disabled due to injury (contusion, trauma or mutilation), illness during the performance of military service duties, the basic amount from which the amount of payment will be calculated is 211,960 hryvnias. For example, if the MSEK established a 20% loss of working capacity for you, then the one-time benefit amount will be UAH 42,392. Finally, one more piece of advice: keep all medical documents (form No. 100, conclusions of VLK, MSEK, certificate on the circumstances of the injury, etc.). Without them, it will be very problematic to prove your right to payments later.

Title: There is fake creativity in the swamps again: screenshots of fake orders of the Ministry of Defense ...
Description: So, recently, a photo of order No. 274t dated September 4, 2024, allegedly from the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, has been circulating on the Internet, in which, with the aim of -following European values-, they order to create special conditions of service for -servicemen representing LGBTQ+-. Also, full-time psychologists of military units are supposed to conduct testing of personnel for belonging to these communities. The so-called document is fake, as is its content. First, the -order- does not meet the requirements of official record keeping. Secondly, the Chief of the General Staff cannot sign the order of the Ministry of Defense. Thirdly, the content of the fake document contradicts at least the Constitution of Ukraine and several laws. In addition, this is not the first time that Russian fakers have tried to ridicule and humiliate LGBT+ representatives, including the military. In the face of a large-scale invasion, Russia describes itself as a territory for everyone who believes exclusively in -traditional values.- And Ukraine is trying to be shown as a country where the authorities are forcibly engaged in -LGBTzation- of citizens. In this way, the aggressor country demonstrates its disdain for the democratic system, opposing it to the -Russian measure-.

Title: One hundred thousand hryvnias and you... a criminal - the swindlers made suspects out of evasions
Description: This was reported by the State Bureau of Investigation. The DBR employees informed about the suspicion of the elder of one of the districts of the Radyvyliv city council and the law enforcement officer, who organized earnings from the evaders. The elder issued summonses to summon men to the military commissariat. During the issuance of subpoenas, he hinted that he could help with evasion. -The scheme consisted in the fact that a law enforcement officer he knew artificially opened criminal proceedings against a conscript, for which he could be given a suspended sentence. During the investigation and while serving the sentence, the -clients- avoided mobilization,- the SBI said. The law enforcement officers note that the service” cost an average of 100,000 UAH The Starosta and the law enforcement officer were notified of the suspicion of obstructing the activities of the Armed Forces of Ukraine by a prior conspiracy by a group of persons, obtaining an unlawful benefit by prior conspiracy, combined with extortion (Part 2 of Article 28, Part 1 of Article 114-1 and Part 3 of Article 368 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: For the first time, Ukrainian companies will be able to participate in tenders of the Drone Coalitio...
Description: About this informs September 17 Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The series of tenders includes two lots: for the production of advanced FPV drones and interceptor drones. Ukrainian companies are invited to participate in these tenders for the first time, which is an important step to support domestic production. To participate in the tender, manufacturers must register on the website Ministry of Defense of Great Britain and submit your applications. Proposals for FPV drones are accepted until October 14th and for interceptor drones until November 11th. All submitted applications will be reviewed by members of the Drone Coalition, after which the winners will be selected. The companies that win the tenders will receive orders for the production of drones for further testing and evaluation. If the test results are successful, a large-scale order of FPV drones from the winning companies is planned. -The goal of this coalition is to ensure the industrial production of FPV drones in order to create a technological advantage over the enemy in the long term,- said Kateryna Chernogorenko, Deputy Minister of Defense of Ukraine for Digitalization. According to her, it is important not only to scale up production in the West, but also to support Ukrainian companies capable of producing such equipment. Therefore, the MOU for the first time involves domestic manufacturers to participate in tenders. We remind you that the Coalition of Drones was created in February 2024 during the 19th meeting in the format -Rammstein-. The initiative is proposed by Latvia and coordinated together with Great Britain. The Coalition includes 16 partner countries that already supply Ukraine with drones. With accumulated funds in the amount of 50 million euros, it is planned to purchase another 20-30 thousand drones. As reported by ArmyInform, the Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov informed about -koalicziya-morskyh-spromozhnostej/->important results according to the results of the 24th meeting Contact group on issues of support to Ukraine in the Rammstein format.

In addition, together with the Prime Minister of Ukraine Denys Shmyhal, he heard today the new work strategies of two government institutions - the Ministry of Development of Communities and Territories and the Ministry of Veterans' Affairs. -Deputy Prime Minister Kuleba and Minister Kalmykova together with their teams reported. The strategies are ambitious, but the main thing is that people really feel the results of the work of the ministries and the government in general. We separately discussed energy and other key issues with Denis Shmyhal,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi said. We will remind you that Rustem Umyerov declared that there will be more F-16s in Ukrainian skies. Earlier ArmyInform reported whatis known about one of the first F-16 pilots.

Title: -I will not step back-: Stalin's order is read to the occupiers in the Kharkiv region
Description: About this in an interview for ArmyInform told the spokesman of the -Kharkiv- OTU, Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. — In the Kharkiv direction, cases are known when the commanders of the occupiers read order No. 227 in front of the formation, using it as an additional motivational tool, he said. According to the spokesman, this indicates that Russians identify the events of the Second World War with modern aggression against Ukraine. They believe that they are continuing the heroic struggle against fascism and Nazism. - They connect all this into a single whole with modern events. This simplifies the perception of the conflict by Russians, as they are forced to believe that Ukraine is not a victim of aggression, but a continuation of the same -fascism- that their grandfathers fought against, Vitaly Sarantsev explained. More about it read in ArmiyaInform's long interview with Vitaliy Sarantseva.

Title: Ruins instead of a city - a creepy excursion through the ruined Time Gap
Description: The video appeared on September 17 on the brigade channel. Some streets looked calm and lively just a month ago, but now there are complete ruins. Civilians still remain in the settlement itself. Here you will see a tour of the ruined city, apartment buildings and abandoned houses from the inside, the cultural center, the central part of Chasovoy Yar and the territory of the brick factory. This video will make it possible to understand the conditions under which soldiers of the 24th brigade hold back the onslaught of overwhelming enemy forces. As reported by ArmyInform, during the criminal launch of ammunition by the enemy, soldiers of the -Rarog- battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo hunted down and burned a heavy flamethrower system of volley fire TOS- 1A -sunflower-.

Title: They scared, immobilized, burned - the classic destruction of a Russian tank
Description: The video appeared on September 17 on the unit's channel. The Russian tank was firing when the first FPV drone hit it. Anti-drone defense saved the enemy equipment, but the crew decided not to risk it and began to flee. But the pilots of -Rarog- had a different opinion and immobilized the invaders' tank with a second drone. It took a third drone hit for the Russian tank to catch fire. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Rarog- battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danylo destroyed a large number of cars that the enemy drives due to the shortage of armored vehicles.

Title: The Armed Forces explained why Russian inhumans execute Ukrainian prisoners
Description: About this in an interview for ArmyInform told Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev, spokesman of the Kharkiv Technical University. The occupiers closely monitor the reaction of Ukrainians to the war crimes of the Russian military, collect comments, and then show their own servicemen what they are called to do with them in captivity. — The case with the 155th Marine Infantry Brigade of the Russian Federation, when they put the head of a Ukrainian soldier separated from his body on a stake and bragged about it on video, proves just that. Of course, this provoked quite outrageous comments on social networks, with calls for the same treatment of Russian prisoners. The propagandists of the Russian Federation collect all these posts (made, in particular, not by Ukrainians themselves, but by Russian bots) and use them for information and propaganda work both among civilians and among the Russian military. In this way, they show, they say, this is what will happen to those who surrender to captivity, the spokesman explained. In addition, the Russians hope to provoke or stage similar war crimes already on the part of the Ukrainian military in order to influence both the Russians and Ukraine's foreign partners with the goal of depriving Ukrainians of international support. More about it read in ArmiyaInform's long interview with Vitaliy Sarantseva.

The vote on the resolution is due to take place at the plenary session of the European Parliament in Strasbourg this Thursday, September 19. As reported by ArmiyaInform, previously the chiefs of general staffs of the armed forces of NATO countries on September 13-15 helda meeting in Prague to implement the decisions of the Washington Summit and discuss how the Alliance will strengthen deterrence and defense while increasing support for Ukraine.

Title: A dealer in -evasive- goods: he received $7,000 per -head-
Description: This was notified in the Donetsk Regional Prosecutor's Office. In June 2024, the man organized a scheme to illegally take men of draft age out of the country. During his visit to Donetsk region, he met a resident of Bilytske, to whom he offered assistance in leaving for the Republic of Hungary outside the checkpoints across the state border of Ukraine. He estimated the service at USD 6,000. In September, after meeting the -client- at the train station in Vinohradiv, the man took him to a rented house. Two days later, he brought the second evader to the -gathering place-. For him, the man raised the cost to $7,000. The impersonator was exposed while receiving the $13,000 and was arrested. He was remanded in custody. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: It was not possible to bomb and set fire, we had to fire — ours destroyed the enemy's position
Description: The video appeared on September 17 on the unit's channel. -The infantry asked our bombers to help clear an important position. Due to the fact that the Putinites mined the approaches to themselves, it was decided to burn the shelter. The task is accomplished,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, assault groups of our defenders overcame the lines of border fortifications and advanced deep into the territory of the Russian Federation.

Title: Higher military educational institutions joined the Course for Trainers on Gender Issues
Description: In cooperation with the Nordic Center for Gender Issues in Military Operations (NCGM), the Croatian Armed Forces (CAF), the Konrad Adenauer Foundation (KAS), the participants received comprehensive training on the implementation of gender perspectives within military operations. The course was opened by the director of RACVIAC Kostiantyn Mykhailo-Grigorije, the representative of the Northern Center of Military Operations, Lt. Col. Lena Quarving, and the official of the Ministry of Defense of the Republic of Croatia, Katarina Adzic. -I was especially inspired by the opportunity to communicate with Ukrainian military women - Colonel Natalia Lytvynenko, freelance adviser to the head of the Military Institute of Taras Shevchenko Kyiv National University, and Olena Pavlova, freelance adviser to the head of the Yevgeny Bereznyak Military Academy on gender issues. Our discussions highlighted the long-standing understanding of the crucial role of gender in conflicts, using the example of Ukraine. It was a great honor for me to share my experience, to highlight the critical importance of gender mainstreaming,- said the panel discussion speaker, Advisor to the Minister of National Defense of Portugal, Diana Morais. 21 participants from security sector institutions from RACVIAC member countries, Ukraine, Jordan, NATO SHAPE, NCGM and PSOTC participated in in-depth distributed learning, lectures, discussions, syndicated work and individual case studies according to the NATO-certified NCGM program. GToT, a course organized by RACVIAC under the auspices of the Northern Center for Gender in Military Operations (NCGM), provides essential tools and strategies for training on gender issues in the military. RACVIAC is focused on advancing gender equality through high-quality training programs and partnerships aimed at fostering collaboration and driving meaningful change in the security sector.

Title: The enemy dropped 14 anti-tank missiles in Sumy region and 17 in Kursk region — General Staff of the...
Description: Operational information as of 4:00 p.m. on September 17 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The terrorist state does not stop using aviation and artillery along the border of the Sumy and Chernihiv regions. In particular, areas of the settlements of Karpovichi, Progress, Ugroida, Stepok, Vysoke, Buchki, and Semenivka came under artillery fire. Enemy aircraft struck the areas of Malushyne, Obody, Richki, Katerynivka, Bondarivshchyna, Pisarivka and Gluhiv with anti-aircraft missiles, using a total of 14 guided aerial bombs. In addition, the enemy made four missile strikes on the city of Sumy. In addition, the enemy has already dropped 17 guided aerial bombs on the Kursk region of the Russian Federation today. The enemy attacked our positions in the Kupyan direction six times. Ukrainian defenders repelled enemy assaults near Synkivka, Novoosynovo and in the direction of Lozova. One skirmish in the Kruglyakivka area is still ongoing. Enemy attacks in the areas of Cherneshchyna, Druzhelyubivka, Makiivka, and Torskoye do not stop in the Lymansky direction. Since the beginning of the day, there have already been eight clashes in this direction, two of them are still ongoing. The situation is under control. In the Siversk direction, the enemy attacked near Verkhnyokamyanskyi and Vyimka, twice tried to break through our defenses. Both attacks were repulsed. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders carried out five assaults near Chasovoy Yar, Stupochy and Klishchiivka. One battle continues in the area of ​​the settlement of Bila Gora. Seven enemy attacks took place in the direction of Toretsk, the enemy mainly attacks near the settlements of Toretsk and Nelipivka, our defenders put up a decent fight. Five engagements have already been completed. The aggressor's aircraft also struck Shcherbynivka, Petrivka and Druzhba with unguided air missiles and anti-aircraft missiles. Since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have already made 19 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their positions in the areas of Grodivka, Novotoretskyi, Orlivka, Mykolaivka, Ukrainska and attacked in the direction of Zeleny Poly in the Pokrovsky direction. The defense forces, restraining the onslaught, have already repelled 14 enemy attacks, five battles are still ongoing. The largest number of clashes at this time is in the Kurakhiv direction. With the support of aviation, the invaders tried to advance 22 times in the vicinity of Tsukuryny, Zhelany Pershy, Hirnyk, Georgiyivka, and Kostyantynivka. Six battles are currently not completed. In the direction of Vremivsk, the invaders attacked six times in the direction of Vugledar and Katerynivka, three attacks are still ongoing. The village of Verbove in the Gulyaipil direction was hit by an airstrike by the National Army. Two enemy attacks were repulsed in the Dnieper direction. In other areas of the front, the situation has not undergone significant changes. As reported by ArmyInform,

Title: Enhanced quality control of goods for the Armed Forces: the MoU conducts a comprehensive inspection
Description: About this informSeptember 17 MOU. It is noted that the inspections involved representatives of the Ministry of Defense, the Armed Forces, the State Rear Operator, as well as specialists in veterinary medicine. -The inspection covers all key stages — from the storage conditions of products in suppliers' warehouses to the direct organization of the food process in military units performing combat missions,- noted Deputy Defense Minister of Ukraine Dmytro Klimenkov. The Ministry of Defense implements the necessary measures to strengthen the quality control of goods supplied to the Armed Forces, as well as to identify possible violations for their prompt resolution. -We will inform about the results of all inspections separately. We do not rest on our laurels and continue to work on providing quality and balanced nutrition for our defenders,- Dmytro Klimenkov emphasized. Such inspections will be carried out regularly in different regions of Ukraine without warning military units and suppliers. As reported by ArmyInform, a new model of food supply for the Armed Forces of Ukraine presented Procurement Agency of the Ministry of Defense -State Rear Operator-. As a pilot project, it will be operational in several regions of Ukraine as early as 2025.

Title: On the first day, the Russians were on the prowl, they did not attack us - the story of the rescue o...
Description: The video appeared on September 17 on the brigade's channel. The hunters took up positions in the village, and soon they heard conversations in Russian behind them. The commanders assured the fighters that it was theirs, and only after the first battle did they realize that the hunters were surrounded. They had to be rescued right under the enemy's nose. As reported by ArmyInform, a soldier of the 68th Yeger Brigade named after Oleksa Dovbush from a long distance shot the Russian invader.

Title: The enemy hit Kharkiv: 4 rescuers were injured
Description: informs the head of Kharkiv OVA Oleg Synegubov about this. -Kharkov shelling: one KAB hit was recorded in a forest strip near the shopping center. -Unfortunately, four rescuers who extinguished the fire nearby are injured,- the report said. Also two civilian men aged 19 and 25 in mild and moderate condition. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday the enemy carried out4030 attacks, 135 of them from rocket salvo fire systems.

Title: An ex-employee of Ukroboronprom was found guilty of treason
Description: The General Prosecutor's Office informed about this on September 17. Prosecutors proved in court that in 2022, an employee of the defense complex went over to the side of the enemy in order to fulfill the task of the Russian special services to collect and transfer detailed information of a military nature to them. During the defense of Kyiv Oblast, in the spring of 2022, the convict gave information about the results of rocket and artillery shelling of the capital and surrounding territories to the curator, an intermediary of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation. After rocket attacks on residential buildings in Kyiv, a man sent photos from the site of damage, images of damaged structures with the exact address, and fragments of the munitions used to strike. In addition, he repeatedly reported to the enemy detailed information about the positions, numbers and movement routes of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, as well as the location of roadblocks, engineering fortifications and weapons depots in the Kyiv region. The representatives of the Russian Federation used the received data to launch new attacks on Ukrainian positions. As a result of the public indictment of the prosecutors of the Vinnytsia Regional Prosecutor's Office, a former employee of the DK -Ukroboronprom- was found guilty of treason (Part 2, Article 111 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The convict's illegal actions were exposed at the beginning of 2023. He was waiting for the court verdict in custody. He did not admit his guilt in court. As reported by ArmyInform, law enforcement officers also investigation into the alleged execution of a Ukrainian serviceman by representatives of the Russian Federation.

Title: Navy units destroyed enemy warehouses with ammunition near Mariupol
Description: informs about this on September 17 of the Navy of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. According to confirmed data, as a result of the strike, the storage infrastructure and tons of ammunition, which the invaders were accumulating for use on the territory of Ukraine, were destroyed. -The Naval Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, together with units of other components of the Defense Forces, continue to destroy the enemy on the ground, in the sea and in the air,- the message reads. As reported by ArmyInform, in the Defense Forces noted, in order to deprive the enemy of the ability to strike the territory of Ukraine with corrected aerial bombs, it is necessary to destroy not only the aircraft that are carriers of KABs, but also the entire airfield infrastructure of the enemy.

Title: An enemy drone attacked residents of Kherson
Description: informs the head of Kherson MBA Roman Mrochko. -A 45-year-old woman was injured. She has explosive and closed craniocerebral injuries, contusion. Medics provided her with the necessary assistance on the spot,- the report said. It is noted that at the time of the Russian drop of explosives from the drone, the victim was in the room. As reported by ArmyInform, yesterday the enemy carried out4030 attacks, 135 of them from rocket salvo fire systems.

Title: Border guards exposed a fictitious marriage: the husband could not name the mother-in-law
Description: This is reported by the State Border Service of Ukraine. The investigation established that the -couple- allegedly went to visit their mother-in-law in Italy. However, the -spouses- could not give answers to a number of logical questions. For example, a man could not even answer his mother-in-law's name. The newlyweds crossed the border at night. Probably hoping for a low vigilance from the law enforcement officers. -It was not possible to cross the border. On the detection of signs of a criminal offense, responsibility for which is provided for in Art. 332 of the Criminal Code -Illegal transportation of persons across the state border of Ukraine-, operatives of the detachment sent a report to the National Police,- the message says. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: The enemy lost more than 7,000 occupiers and 120 armored vehicles in a week in the East
Description: informs operational and strategic grouping of troops -Khortytsia-. The total losses of the Russian army only in the eastern direction - in the area of ​​responsibility of the -Khortytsia- air defense system for the week from 09.09.24 to 09.16.2024 are: It is noted that the Defense Forces continue to actively inflict losses on the enemy's troops in manpower and equipment, exhaust the enemy along the entire battle lines. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders was 1020 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed two tanks, six armored combat vehicles, six artillery systems, one anti-aircraft missile system, 66 operational-tactical UAVs, 27 vehicles and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers.

Title: Shoot or surrender: the Armed Forces explained the choice of the Russians
Description: The choice of the Russians explained in an interview for ArmiyaInform, the spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv-, Colonel Vitaly Sarantsev. — Surrender is considered something shameful, if a person surrendered even wounded and unable to continue fighting, they still consider him a traitor and a criminal, even his closest relatives disown him very often, he said. This attitude towards prisoners in Russian society also prompts Russian soldiers to die or commit suicide in order not to surrender. — Some of them prefer to self-destruct — shoot themselves, blow themselves up with a grenade, or even strangle themselves with an Esmarch harness — than surrender to captivity, Vitaliy Sarantsev said. In addition, Russian propaganda widely spreads allegations that Ukrainians mistreat prisoners. This is not true, but the occupying soldiers believe it. Read more read about it in a big interview with Vitaliy Sarantseva ArmiyaInform. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that the Russians found a way to replenish losses on the front.

Title: As a result of the Russian attack on Glukhov, the elevator was seriously damaged. There are wounded
Description: This was announced on September 17 by the -North- operational command. The occupiers dropped, according to preliminary data, three SAMs (guided aerial bombs). As a result of the enemy attack, two wounded: a father and a son, who are 64 and 34 years old, respectively, were reported to the Sumy regional prosecutor's office. At least 20 private homes, a vehicle and an elevator were also damaged. As reported by ArmyInform, a person died in Sumy Oblast /a> as a result of a Russian attack on an energy facility.

Title: PPBE's new model of defense management will be tested by the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation ...
Description: About this informs September 17 MOU. The purpose of this model is to support informed management decisions in the field of defense. The pilot implementation of the new model will be carried out on the basis of a certain type, a separate type of troops (forces) of the Armed Forces of Ukraine by the end of 2025. After the adoption of appropriate changes to the current legislation, the model is planned to be extended to all components of the Defense Forces. -The new approach, among other things, involves planning the development and maintenance of the capabilities of the Armed Forces, and in the future, other components of the Defense Forces, for the medium (5 years) and long-term (10 years) perspective,- the message reads. Aspects of this model include a clear distribution of expenditures by key areas based on a multi-criteria analysis of the development of defense capabilities. Such analysis is used to calculate the cost of each capability, taking into account real resource needs. Determines the life cycles and effectiveness of weapons and military equipment for each type, separate type of troops (forces) of the Armed Forces. -In the process of improving the defense management system, our task is to arm ourselves with new effective methods, synchronize and gain interoperability with our foreign partners in the application of progressive planning processes,- said First Deputy Minister of Defense, Lieutenant General Ivan Gavrylyuk. According to him, another task is to form a clear vision of the prospects of the capabilities of the Ukrainian army at the next stages of development, using new analysis tools. By the end of the current year, the target model of the transformation of the defense management system and the road map for the implementation of the PPBV process will be sent for review to the interested executive authorities and specialized committees of the Verkhovna Rada. As reported by ArmyInform, previously the IOU successfully completed a cycle of joint governance courses aimed at increasing the efficiency of decision-making and implementation in the department.

Title: Anchor them in the bay: the marines shot the tank and the crew of the Russians with drones
Description: This was reported by the Defense Forces of Southern Ukraine. -Aerial scouts with the help of attack drones hit an enemy tank and its personnel. Now minus one Russian tank will pose a threat to Ukrainian defenders. Glory to Ukraine! Glory to the marines!- - added in the Defense Forces of the South. Formerly ArmyInform showed how the 61st separate mechanized Steppe brigade captured 13 Russians during the battles in Kurshchyna.

Title: Oleksandr Zavitnevich told what the Kursk operation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is for Putin
Description: About it on Facebook wrote the head of the Committee of the Verkhovna Rada of Ukraine on National Security, Defense and Intelligence Oleksandr Zavitnevich. -Russia understands only force - one of the main conclusions that the Ukrainians in alliance with their partners proved during the years of the great war of the Russian Federation against Ukraine. Another conclusion, which Ukraine knows well from the history of interaction with an aggressive neighbor, is that the indecision of those who possess this greater power to force the Russian Federation to accept the proposed conditions for the cessation of aggression motivates Moscow in any way to look for an opportunity to freeze the final and fair resolution of the problem. And all this in order to wait for the right opportunity and implement all their insidious aggressive plans, rejecting all previous agreements,- – the post says. According to Oleksandr Zavitnevich, all the peace-making rhetoric of the Kremlin is the art of quackery and quackery. It can make a certain impression, but at the level of a political show. -The Kursk operation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine is a real political knockdown of Putin, it highlighted the entire current state of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, the management system. Even in the information space of the enemy, sometimes, albeit short-lived, signs of intelligence - the leadership of the Russian Federation is not so wise and far-sighted and that under his tenure, the Russian Federation is in for a disaster. Right now is the right moment to beat the enemy, not to give him a chance to recover, to recover, to end this war on fair terms by signing them at the Second Peace Summit initiated by Ukraine-, – the head of the Committee notes. And he adds that it is important that the partners finally agree to President Volodymyr Zelenskyi's proposal to give Ukraine permission to use long-range weapons deep into the territory of the Russian Federation: -The national resistance of Ukrainians did everything possible to ensure that the Europeans avoided trenches and air strikes. In order for the heroism and sacrifices of Ukrainians not to be in vain, so that the Russian beast does not invade Europe, only one thing is needed - the appropriate decisions of our partners in support of Volodymyr Zelenskyi's proposals-. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Oleksandr Zavitnevich spoke about the planned changes to the Law on Mobilization.

Title: He was performing a partisan mission behind enemy lines: the drones joined the rescue operation
Description: The National Guard of Ukraine published the relevant video on September 17 on its channel. -In the rear of the enemy, in the temporarily occupied territories, the man performed a partisan mission and identified enemy positions, after which he had to swim across the river to successfully evacuate,- the defenders said. It is noted that several brigades of the State Security Service and the National Guard took part in the rescue operation, and defenders from the 11th Brigade named after M. Hrushevsky threw three lifebuoys to him and helped him evacuate to a safe place. Earlier ArmyInform showed how units of the Airborne Assault Troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine in to one of the settlements of the Kursk region by concerted actions >knocked down a modern Russian BMD-4 landing combat vehicle.

Title: They staged sabotage on the railway: three arsonists were detained
Description: About inform September 17 in the SBU. According to the case materials, two of the detainees are brothers. The third is a mutual acquaintance of theirs. -The perpetrators were recruited by the Russian special services through Telegram channels, where they were looking for 'easy money.' At first, only the brothers were engaged in subversive activities,- the report says. At the beginning of September, a Russian curator came to them and gave them a -test- task: for a small reward, make seven provocative graffiti on different streets of Chernivtsi. After that, a representative of the Russian special services proposed a -more serious- job - to set fire to relay cabinets, which was supposed to disrupt rail traffic in the region. -The perpetrators committed the first arson, and in the second they involved their acquaintance, an unemployed man from Chernivtsi,- the SBU said. As evidenced by the proceedings, the three of them planned to carry out all subsequent arsons. The Security Service of Ukraine and the National Police prevented further arsons and arrested all three perpetrators -on hot pursuit.- During the searches of their residences, mobile phones with evidence of subversive activities for the benefit of the Russian Federation were seized. The SBU investigators informed the suspects about the suspicion for h. 2 Art. 28 and h. 2 Art. 113 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine (sabotage committed by a group of persons under martial law in accordance with a previous conspiracy). The extras are in custody, facing up to life in prison. As reported by ArmyInform, SBU Counterintelligenceexposedanother agent group of the Main Directorate of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation (more known as a game) that operated in Zaporozhye. The perpetrators were preparing coordinates for Russian airstrikes on military and critical infrastructure facilities in the region.

Title: Total resistance: SSO calls to shake off the stinking wreckage of a rotten empire
Description: A video with a call to join the Resistance Movement was published on the Telegram channel of the Special Operations Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -We are the people of Ukraine, we are total resistance to the defense of independence. We are everywhere. We see everything. We are at home. We are the land that holds us and collapses under the foot of the occupier. We are a fire that warms our own and burns the enemy. We are the water that waters Ukraine and drowns the invader. We are the air that Ukrainians breathe freely, and the air that poisons Russians,- the SSO said in a statement. The special forces emphasized that the resistance movement is spreading and gathering momentum to shake off the stinking ruins of the rotten empire from Ukraine. -Every day we are getting closer to victory over our archenemy. We are at home, so no one will rule here but us!- - emphasized the soldiers. You can join the Resistance Movement by following the link. As ArmyInform wrote, in Digital recruiting will be launched in Ukraine: the first details from the Ministry of Defense.

Title: - Sooner or later, Kharkiv will be under the Russian Federation - law enforcement officers detained ...
Description: Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. Under the procedural guidance of the Kharkiv District Prosecutor's Office of the Kharkiv Region, a 36-year-old woman was informed of suspicion of justifying, recognizing as legitimate the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine (Chapter 1, Article 3, Article 436-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). According to the investigation, the unemployed resident of the city of Lubotyn, having plenty of free time, actively promoted pro-Kremlin narratives on the Internet. The woman systematically distributed comments in one of the pro-Russian groups in the Telegram messenger. Yes, the person involved wrote that Russia should hit the buildings of state authorities in Ukraine with missiles. In addition, she indicated the following: -Sooner or later, Kharkiv will be under the Russian Federation.- However, most of her comments were about Ukrainian defenders. The woman systematically humiliated the Defense Forces, wishing them dead. And she did not stop there. The commentator managed to accuse the Kharkiv authorities of disseminating information about the mining of one of the local cemeteries. In her opinion, this is a fake. She wrote that the officials do not want Kharkiv residents to see -sticks with rags- - these are the cynical and humiliating words the admirer of -Russian world- described the graves of Ukrainian soldiers. Law enforcement officers exposed the woman. The department emphasized that Kharkiv under the Russian flag will remain only in her thoughts, while in reality the accused faces a maximum of eight years in prison with confiscation of property. As reported by ArmyInform, at the Zaporizhzhia Defense Plant /->detained a woman--rat- who worked for Russia.

Title: White is the hit of the season: 13 Russians effectively surrendered
Description: This was reported by the Commander of the Ground Forces of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, Lieutenant General Oleksandr Pavliuk. -The ground forces continue to replenish the exchange fund. Kursk operation. After 5 days of fierce fighting, the enemy was left without water and ammunition. As a result, the white flag will be raised,- said the Commander of the Ground Forces Oleksandr Pavlyuk added that on that day a separate mechanized Steppe Brigade of the Ground Forces captured 13 Russians, 4 of them were seriously wounded. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how in the South the aerial reconnaissance of the State Border Service discovered a well-disguised vehicle of the occupiers, and operators of strike drones promptly destroyed it.

Title: Conscripts are replacing stormtroopers: the Russians have found a way to replenish losses on the fro...
Description: Vitaly Sarantsev, the spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv-, reported this on the -Suspilne Novosti- broadcast. -In order to take personnel from secondary tasks, the enemy replaces stormtroopers or those who are capable of conducting assaults at all with conscripts who perform secondary tasks,- he said. Instead, those servicemen who were freed due to such rotations are redirected by the Russian command directly to conduct offensive actions. At the same time, conscripts who perform special tasks to ensure logistics on the territory of the Russian Federation are in the same risk zone as any other servicemen of the Russian army. — We inflict fire damage on the enemy, wherever he is. And if his forces and means appear in the range of our FPV drones or artillery, then, accordingly, they are destroyed even at the stage of advancing towards the Ukrainian border, the spokesman noted. The military man emphasized that, as a result, conscripts of the Russian army are also dying on Russian territory. In addition, Vitaly Sarantsev reminded that in Russia there is a practice of enlisting conscripts into combat operations after 4 months of service. — They are agitating conscripts who have served certain terms to switch to contract service. They are promised a powerful social package so that they have already moved to another status and they can be involved in directly conducting hostilities, the military explained. So, despite the fact that Russian conscripts currently perform tasks of a secondary nature, they are already participating in hostilities and are a legitimate military target. Earlier, ArmyInform told, how the Russians use strokoviks in the Kharkiv direction.

Title: The trick of the Carpathian -molfar-: turned 20,000 packs of butter into margarine for the military
Description: This was reported by the Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region. According to the investigation, the entrepreneur, on the basis of the contract concluded in June 2023 with the Ministry of Defense to provide the military with high-quality food, ignored the requirements of state standards and instead of 20,000 packages of butter, organized the delivery of margarine of unknown origin. In this way, the military units got a fabricated product that does not meet the parameters established by the regulations. In addition, on the basis of false documents, he was able to get a settlement, and later to legalize the funds with the help of financial transactions. The amount of damages reached more than half a million hryvnias. Currently, the businessman has been informed of the suspicion and a precautionary measure has been taken. Involvement in the crime of other persons is checked. Earlier ArmyInform reported that a Kharkiv businesswoman who financed the production of Russian weapons through a business partner from Moscow will stand trial.

Title: Last day, 73 shelters and 3 enemy ammunition depots were attacked by the Defense Forces
Description: informs OSUV -Khortytsia- on its official Telegram channel -Khortytsky Wind-. As noted, the Defense Forces continue to inflict losses on the enemy in manpower and equipment. In particular, in this direction, Russian losses per day are: Also, our soldiers destroyed 73 shelters and 3 enemy ammunition depots. We will remind, our soldiers hit two -other important objects of the occupiers-. As reported by ArmyInform, last day the losses of the Russian invaders amounted to 1020 people.

Title: Logistics - in manual mode - in Kharkiv Oblast forces the occupiers to surrender
Description: Vitaly Sarantsev, the spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv-, reported this on the -Suspilne Novosti- broadcast. Cases when the enemy surrenders in the Kharkiv direction have become more frequent. Yesterday, there were two Russian prisoners in the north of Kharkiv region, and today four occupiers surrendered. — The adversary is forced to find new routes for logistics, to change logistics methods. If earlier he used the technique in some places, now he does all this exclusively in manual mode, that is, he carries everything by hand, he said. This situation arose as a result of the successful actions of the Defense Forces, primarily fighters from the UAV units, who broke the supply chains in the enemy's near rear with the help of bomber drones and kamikaze drones. — An opponent who has been in advanced positions for a long time does not receive adequate support. We manage to break the logistics chains and, accordingly, they sit without food, without water. Of course, this in a certain way affects their moral and psychological state and they prefer to surrender themselves to captivity than to return to their commanders, to the inhumane treatment that is organized in them directly in the places, the spokesman explained. The military emphasized that the motivational measures for the personnel of the Russian occupying forces by the enemy command have the opposite effect to what the Russians wanted. — They only contribute to the enemy losing faith in the military and political leadership and, accordingly, they choose the right path for themselves in terms of surrendering, — Vitaly Sarantsev concluded. The spokesman said that cases of desertion of the Russian military are currently observed in several areas of the Kharkiv direction - in the Vovchansk region, near Hlyboky and Lukyantsi. -The personnel have a certain percentage of demoralization and refuse to follow orders, refuse to carry out combat missions, refuse to carry out special tasks of casualty evacuation or logistical support,- he said. The military expressed hope that this trend will continue and strengthen. The Ukrainian military is interested and takes the necessary measures to make the enemy understand that his only chance to stay alive is surrender. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the Kharkiv direction to surrender the occupiers are being captured by hopelessness, recently the number of captives has increased.

Title: A sword was stuck in the body: prosecutors began an investigation into the execution of a Ukrainian ...
Description: This is reported by the Office of the Prosecutor General. Under the procedural leadership of the Donetsk regional prosecutor's office, a pre-trial investigation into criminal proceedings has been initiated for violation of the laws and customs of war, combined with intentional murder (Part 2 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). In particular, on September 17, 2024, one of the Telegram channels published a post about the probable execution of a Ukrainian defender by representatives of the SSR in the city of Novogrodivka. The released photos show that the occupiers stuck a sword into the body of a serviceman of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. In the image, the slain serviceman is missing his equipment and has sticky tape on one of his hands. The criminal regime continues its purposeful policy of destroying everything Ukrainian, demonstrating to the whole world its monstrous cruelty and cynically disregarding any values ​​and norms of the civilized world. -Our goal is to find and punish everyone involved in these crimes. The world must see the atrocities of the occupiers and respond decisively to every such case. Only by joint efforts can we punish this evil,- General Prosecutor Andriy Kostin emphasized. A number of urgent investigative and search operations are currently underway. The circumstances of the offense are being investigated in order to identify the involved and guilty persons. Within the framework of the criminal proceedings, orders and inquiries are directed to the relevant competent services and institutions. The pre-trial investigation is carried out by investigators of the State Security Service of Ukraine in the Donetsk and Luhansk regions. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers killed a Ukrainian prisoner of war with a sword.

Title: A female rat who worked for Russia was detained at the Zaporizhzhia defense plant
Description: About this informs Security Service of Ukraine. Among the priority targets of the enemy were air defense systems, deployment points of the Defense Forces and enterprises of the defense-industrial complex. The occupiers were also interested in the routes of transporting Ukrainian weapons and ammunition to the front line. According to the case materials, two residents of Zaporozhye turned out to be agents of the Russian military intelligence. One of the detainees is an employee of the Zaporizhia Strategic Defense Plant. The woman gave the enemy information about the location of workshops where military products are produced, and also reported on missile damage to the enterprise where she worked. Another SBU agent was caught red-handed when he spied on units of the Armed Forces of Ukraine based in Zaporizhzhia. To collect data, the person involved not only went around the city, but also -darkly- asked for the information he needed during everyday conversations with acquaintances. During searches, mobile phones and computer equipment with evidence of working for the enemy were found in the possession of the suspects. -Currently, the investigators of the Security Service have informed the agents about the suspicion under Part 2 of Art. 111 (treason committed under martial law) and part 3 of Art. 114-2 (unauthorized dissemination of information about the movement, movement or location of the Armed Forces) of the Criminal Code of Ukraine,- the message reads. The suspects are being held without bail. They face life imprisonment with confiscation of property. Documenting the crime was carried out by SBU counterintelligence agents in Zaporizhzhia region and employees of the Main Directorate of SBU in Donetsk and Luhansk regions under the procedural guidance of regional prosecutors' offices. As reported by ArmyInform, the end of the saboteur's career: detained a man from Chernihiv who was helping to destroy his own city.

Title: Donetsk region is being destroyed by artillery: more than half a hundred houses were damaged by shel...
Description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk OVA Vadym Filashkin. Volnovaskyi district. 23 private houses were damaged in Bogoyavlenka of Ugledarska hromada. Pokrovsky district. In Kurakhovo, 2 people were injured, high-rise buildings, 23 private houses and an infrastructure object were damaged. Administrative buildings were damaged in Myrnograd. In Pokrovsk, 3 people were injured, an infrastructure object and an administrative building were damaged. Kramatorsky district. In Lyman, 3 non-residential buildings were damaged, in Zarichny, a house was destroyed. In Kostyantynivka, a high-rise building, a private house and an infrastructure object were damaged. Bakhmut district. In Seversk, 2 high-rise buildings and 2 private houses were damaged. In the Chasovoyarsk community, 14 private houses, a high-rise building and a non-residential building were damaged. In addition, 526 people, including 144 children, were evacuated from the front line. As reported by ArmyInform, the occupiers made 177 strikes on the Zaporizhzhia region: there is destruction.

Title: Individually and in groups: -tankers- of the Russian Federation are thrown -on the front line- in th...
Description: Detailed information about the situation and enemy losses in the Kharkiv direction informed in Kharkiv OTU. In the area of ​​the settlement Hlyboke, the enemy is carrying out a single movement of personnel with the aim of replenishing the current shortage in the forward positions of the 11th tank regiment of the 18th motorized rifle division. Near Lukyantsiv, the enemy is building up a communication system, has carried out logistical support measures, and established a group of servicemen at the position of the 380th Motorized Rifle Regiment of the 47th Tank Division of the 1st Tank Army with the aim of preparing for assault operations. In Vovchansk, the Russian occupiers carried out measures to evacuate sanitary casualties and logistical support, strengthened the assault groups of the 128th separate motorized rifle brigade of the 44th army corps. In the area of ​​the settlement Tikhe, the main focus was on conducting aerial reconnaissance with the aim of identifying units of the Defense Forces of Ukraine. During the past 24 hours, there have been 2 combat clashes. the Russian occupiers carried out 1 airstrike using 1 anti-aircraft missile and 26 kamikaze drone strikes. 321 shelling of positions of Ukrainian defenders was carried out. The defense forces of Ukraine respond adequately to the actions of the enemy and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses over the past day amounted to 62 creatures, of which 10 were irretrievable, and 48 were sanitary. Four occupiers surrendered as prisoners. Also, in our direction, the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 59 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular: Also in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 35 shelters for personnel, an ammunition storage area, and 3 UAV launch pads. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in the area of ​​the Aggregate Plant in Vovchansk, the occupiers hit their own units with anti-aircraft missiles.

Title: Institute for the study of war and media: the Armed Forces explained how to avoid distorting the fac...
Description: On this emphasized the spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv- Vitaly Sarantsev in an interview with ArmiyaInform. — The Institute for the Study of War is an authoritative resource that analyzes the situation based on open data. However, its reports are often based on a large amount of information from various sources, which may change or be incomplete. At the same time, ISW does not distinguish between official and unofficial sources and very often uses propagandistic Russian materials in its analysis, he said. Voiskovy emphasized that credit should be given to the Institute's analysts, because they always refer to sources of information, providing a list of everything they used during the preparation of the report. At the same time, he noted that the Ukrainian media often unjustifiably perceive the Institute's messages as a definitive fact, thus presenting society with a distorted picture of events. — This undermines our work, the work of the official communication channels of the military-political leadership of the state, the work of communicators of the Armed Forces and Defense Forces as a whole. We are conducting a defense operation in which every action, including informing the public, must be subordinated to the interests of defense. Using unverified information, even taking it from such a powerful resource as the Institute for the Study of War, one can unknowingly play along with the enemy, the spokesman emphasized. More about the information space of modern war read in the great interview of Vitaly Sarantseva ArmiyaInform. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Ministry of Defense officials held a meeting with the delegation of the Institute for the Study of War, emphasizing that The Institute for the Study of War is one of the well-known analytical centers whose work helps the world see the real state of affairs during the Russian aggression against Ukraine.

Title: They risk themselves, but help others: the President congratulated the rescuers
Description: He wrote about this in his Telegram channel. The head of state emphasized that these are the people who arrive at the sites of shelling among the first. They risk themselves, but help others. -Our rescuers are always where they are needed most. Thank you for your courage! Thank you for saving the lives of our people!- — emphasized Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, rescuers showed rescue of an elderly woman from under the rubble in the Kharkiv region.

Title: The occupiers executed a Ukrainian prisoner of war with a sword
Description: This was reported by Dmytro Lubinets on his Telegram channel. -The level of barbarism and bloodthirstiness is unfathomable. Such actions are a gross violation of the Geneva Convention on the Treatment of Prisoners of War,- – emphasized the Commissioner. Dmytro Lubinets noted that the world should stop looking at how Russia openly shows disdain for any norms and laws. The ombudsman sent letters to international organizations, the ICRC and the UN, asking them to record yet another violation of human rights by Russia. Separately, he emphasized that such show executions are aimed at demoralizing Ukrainian society. However, seeing such actions, we must become even more determined in the fight against the aggressor. As reported by ArmyInform, servicemen of the Russian Armed Forces shot three Ukrainian military personnel who surrendered. The killing of prisoners of war is a violation of the requirements of the Geneva Conventions and is classified as a grave international crime.

A 63-year-old man was injured by artillery shelling from the Russian military in the village of Podola of the Kuril community. Also, in the Kupyan district, the enemy hit the village of Pavlivka of the Dvorichan community, the forest was on fire. , an oil depot, a private house was damaged; shelled the village of Senkove of the Kuriliv community, damaging a private house; struck outside the village of Hrushyvka of the Kindrashivsk community, as a result of which a fire broke out in the ecosystem - grass burned on an area of ​​1.5 hectares. In the city of Bogoduhiv, as a result of shelling, grass burned on an area of ​​3 hectares. The enterprise, four private houses, an apartment building, and a warehouse were damaged. The Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office previously reported that as a result of the shelling, a 50-year-old woman from Bogodukhov suffered an acute reaction to stress In the city, premises, equipment of an agricultural enterprise and at least 25 residential buildings and farm buildings were damaged. According to preliminary data, the enemy struck the city with three KAB-250s. The occupiers also shelled an open area outside the village of Hubarivka of the Bogoduhivska hromada - there, as a result of the shelling, grass was burning on an area of ​​200 square meters. In the Vovchan community of the Chuguyiv district, the Russian military struck Verkhnyi Saltov, causing a fire in the ecosystem on an area of ​​5 hectares, as well as in the village of Losivka, where structural elements of a destroyed house burned as a result of shelling and grass on an area of ​​500 sq. m. In the Izyum district, the village of Bohuslavka was hit by enemy attacks, a private house was damaged there, and forest litter on an area of ​​20 hectares was on fire. In the village of Nova Kozacha, Dergachiv community, Kharkiv district, grass on an area of ​​300 square meters burned as a result of shelling. In the Lyman direction, the enemy carried out 21 assaults near Grekivka, Druzhelyubivka, Makiivka, Nevsky, Novosadovo, Belogorivka, and in Serebryansk Forestry. In the Seversky direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled three attacks by Russian invaders near Ivano-Daryivka and Pereizny. In the direction of Toretsk the enemy, supported by aviation, carried out 19 attacks near Nelipivka, Druzhba, Toretsk and Zalizny. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 40 attacks of the aggressor. The Russian occupiers were most active near Vozdvizhenka, Grodivka, Novogrodivka, Marynivka, and Krasny Yar. The greatest concentration of enemy attacks was recorded near Grodivka and Novogrodivka. In the Kurakhiv direction Defense forces repelled 42 attacks near Ukrasnya, Tsukurino, Zhelany Pershy, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. In the Orikhov direction, one assault on our positions in the Robotyno area was recorded. In the Dnieper direction the enemy conducted five unsuccessful assaults. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. The operation is ongoing in the Kursk region. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,020 people. Ukrainian soldiers also destroyed two tanks, six armored fighting vehicles, six artillery systems, one anti-aircraft missile system, 66 operational-tactical UAVs, 27 vehicles and a unit of special equipment of the occupiers.
