As reported by ArmyInform, fighters of the 17th tank brigade named after Konstantin Pestushka tracked down the occupier who used our cat and the scoundrel was punished in an exemplary manner.

Title: GUR: Every operation to capture the enemy is a rescue of brothers who are in Russian captivity
Description: Andrii Yusov, a representative of the Main Intelligence Directorate of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine, shared the details on September 13 on the air of -Social News-. Today is the 56th exchange during the period of the full-scale invasion. 49 of our defenders have returned. Among them are the National Guard, the National Guard, the Armed Forces, the border guards, who were illegally convicted by the Russian invaders. We meet today at our homes. They are now provided with the first necessary medical assistance, psychological assistance, and initial examination. Next, of course, is a long rehabilitation process,- Andriy Yusov said. The representative of the GUR commented on the return from captivity of the defenders of Azovstal. -For Ukraine, the return of every defender from all divisions is an important task and everyone must return. But Russian propaganda pays special attention to individual units, individual episodes of the shameful Russian genocidal war against Ukrainians. However, no matter how difficult it is, we return ours. And the defenders of Azovstal were returned last exchange. Then they were conscripts. And this exchange we also have good news for the Mariupol garrison. And it will continue,- stated the representative of the Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. According to Andrii Yusov, the large-scale replenishment of the exchange fund during the Kursk operation also played a huge role in the exchange. Although each operation to capture the enemy is a separate difficult job and additional risks for our defenders, they save the lives of their brothers who are in Russian captivity. How ArmyInform reported earlier that 49 soldiers and civilians, including the Hero of Ukraine, returned home from Russian captivity.

Title: Autoautodafe - royal drones burned a bunch of enemy cars
Description: The video appeared on September 13 on the brigade channel. Enemy vehicles were hit both while parked and while moving, camouflaged and not. -The occupiers are missed,- the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, soldiers of the -Rarog- battalion of the 24th mechanized brigade named after King Danilo with their hits set fire not only to enemy equipment, but also personnel composition of the occupiers.

Title: Hit -Hurricane- - our drones destroyed the enemy's anti-aircraft missile system
Description: The video of the hits was released on September 13 on the unit's channel. -Our FPV drone operators continue to destroy enemy equipment and shelters. And they do it very beautifully,- the drones commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, UAV operators of the rapid response border commandant of the shock drone company of the -Phoenix- air complexes of the -Revenge- offensive guard brigade collected a series night attacks of enemy equipment and personnel.

Title: Nails were pulled out and electrocuted here: torture chambers during the occupation were inspected b...
Description: About this reported in the Prosecutor General's Office. The head of investigations into international crimes committed in Ukraine from the Office of the Prosecutor of the International Criminal Court, Brenda J. Hollis, together with her team and the head of the Department for Combating Crimes Committed in the Conditions of Armed Conflict, of the Office of the Prosecutor General, Yury Belousov, inspected the torture chambers set up by the Russian military during the occupation of Kharkiv region Spartak Borysenko, the head of the Department for Combating Crimes Committed in the Conditions of the Armed Conflict of the Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office, said that prosecutors together with other law enforcement officers discovered 25 murders in Kharkiv Oblast. Collected evidence shows that detainees were subjected to torture, physical, psychological and sexual violence. People were hardly fed and given only technical water to drink. Teeth were sawed off, wrists were tied, and with the help of a crane with a metal hook, people's bodies were lifted into the air, nails were pulled out, electric current was applied through wires tied to different parts of the body, and rubber sticks were beaten. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that law enforcement officers identified six Russian military personnel who tortured civilians during the occupation of Kharkiv region.

Title: Almost a third of all enemy attacks — the General Staff of the Armed Forces — fell on the Kurakhiv d...
Description: Operational information as of 16:00 on September 13 was published by the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. Border settlements of Sumy, Chernihiv, and Kharkiv regions continue to suffer from artillery shelling from the territory of the Russian Federation. The areas of the settlements of Semenivka, Starykovo and Vidrodenivske were affected by the fire of barrel artillery and MLRS. Also, the aggressor carried out airstrikes in the areas of Pavlivka, Okhtyrka, Yampil and Kisla Dubina settlements, using eight air defense systems. The Russians are bombing the Kursk region of the Russian Federation: according to the available information, 15 strikes by sixteen guided aerial bombs have been made on its territory. In addition, in the Kharkiv direction, the Russian occupiers once in vain attacked the defense lines of Ukrainian units near Gatysh. In the Kupyansk direction, Ukrainian soldiers repelled two enemy attacks near Petropavlivka and Stelmakhivka, and three more clashes continue near Synkivka, Hlushkivka, and Lozova. In the Lyman direction, the invading army carried out 14 attacks during the day near Kopanyk, Grekivka, Makiivka, Nevsky, Yampolivka, Torsky, Serebryanka and Bilogorivka. Ten clashes have ended at this time, four more are ongoing. The enemy used assault aircraft in the areas of Novoyehorivka and Serebryansk Forestry. The enemy carried out offensive actions in the Siversky direction in the areas of Verkhnokamianske, Spirne and Viimka settlements. The defense forces of Ukraine are steadily holding back the enemy. So far, three attacks by the occupiers have been repelled. In the Kramatorsk direction, the invaders carried out three assaults on the positions of our troops near Chasovoy Yar and Andriivka. One battle is over, two more are in progress. Bondarne and Chasiv Yar were hit by anti-aircraft missiles and unguided aerial missiles. In the Toretsk direction, with the support of aviation, two enemy attacks took place in the Dachnoy area. The aggressor carries out airstrikes on Toretsk, Kostyantynivka, Shcherbynivka and Petrivka, having already used nine air bombs. In the Pokrovsky direction, since the beginning of the day, the occupiers have made 11 attempts to dislodge our defenders from their occupied positions in the areas of the settlements of Zelene Pole, Vozdvizhenka, Novooleksandrivka, Myrolyubivka, Novotroitske and Grodivka. The defense forces restrained the onslaught and repulsed nine enemy attacks, two clashes are still ongoing. Enemy losses are being refined. Today, it is the hottest in the Kurakhiv direction, the occupiers carried out 21 attacks near Ukranian, Zhelanny Pershy, Georgiyivka, Kostyantynivka, and Katerynivka. Currently, four battles are taking place in the districts of Kostyantynivka and Zhelany Pershy. In the Vremivsk direction, units of our troops repelled four Russian assaults near Katerynivka, Vugledar, and Zolotaya Niva. At this time, three more clashes are ongoing in three locations in the Vugledara area. In the Dnieper direction, our defenders repelled one enemy attack, another one is ongoing. Mykolaivka, Odradokamyanka and Kozatske were hit by unguided aerial missiles. At the moment, no offensive actions of the enemy have been recorded in the Orihiv and Gulyaipil directions. As ArmiyaInform reported, 143 combat clashes were recorded during the past day.

Title: The President of Ukraine answered whether the operation in Kurshchyna was a mistake
Description: He told about this during his participation in the 20th annual meeting of the Yalta European Strategy. Volodymyr Zelenskyi also noted that thanks to the Kursk operation, it was possible to stop the enemy in the Kharkiv direction and slow down the advance of the Russians in the Donetsk region. After the operation in Kurshchyna, the backlog of the Armed Forces of Ukraine for shells near Pokrovsk decreased from 1:12 to 1:2.5. -In Kurshchyna, the Russians began their rapid offensive. About 60-70 thousand people want to apply. We know about 40,000 are already there,- the President noted. The President noted that it is a pleasant fact that not only Ukraine is talking about the deoccupation of its territories, but also Russia. In addition, Volodymyr Zelenskyi answered the question whether the Kursk operation was a mistake. The head of state recalled the Russian offensive in the Kharkiv direction, which is also a very important center of the eastern part of Ukraine. -You saw that they broke through our defenses, wanted to capture Kharkiv, in addition to their official messages regarding the construction of some buffer zones along our entire border, and they would not have finished with the East,- noted Volodymyr Zelenskyy. The President noted that we later received intelligence from our partners. -In the north of our state, starting from Sumshchyna, from the east to the north of our state, plans were being prepared to create appropriate buffer zones, and with one or another military success, they wanted to capture the centers of these regions. This is what the Kursk operation gave,- the head of state summarized. In the opinion of Volodymyr Zelenskyi, the operation gave the results that everyone was counting on. -The enemy has been stopped in Kharkiv Oblast, its advance on Donetsk Oblast has slowed down, although it is very difficult there, and there is still a long way to positive things there. However, they withdrew their forces from Kharkiv Oblast, Zaporozhye and other groups that were preparing in the north for the occupation of our territories. The enemy began to move all this to the Kursk direction. This is what happened,- added the President.

Title: Disability for $12,000 — a member of the VLK was detained in Poltava Oblast
Description: The State Bureau of Investigation reported this on September 13. The figure valued his -services- at $12,000. So, he promised to help one of the reserve officers to issue a second disability group for going abroad. After receiving $12,000, the VLK member was detained and reported on suspicion of abuse of influence (Part 2 of Article 369-2 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine). The court chose a preventive measure for the detainee in the form of detention with the possibility of a bail of half a million hryvnias. Information on the involvement of other officials in the scheme, including employees of the TCC and JV, is being checked. ArmyInform reminds that it is better not to break the law, but to use the aggregator of vacancies in the Armed Forces or recruiting centers.

Title: Neither shoot nor ride — drones hit enemy guns and -loaves-
Description: Video of the damage appeared on September 13 on the unit's channel. In total, two enemy guns and four UAZ-452 (loaf) were destroyed. -Thank you to everyone who is involved in all these destructions, together we are a force,- commented personnel in the brigade. As reported by ArmyInform, the pilots of the -Ronin- unit of the 65th mechanized brigade are on duty forced to silence enemy guns.

Title: Enemy armored assaults have become more frequent in Kharkiv Oblast: how to counter them
Description: How this can be countered told on the air of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon, the spokesman of the Kharkiv OTU Vitaly Sarantsev. — Last day, the enemy tried to storm the units of the Defense Forces in Vovchansk and used two BMPs for support. Both machines were detected already during the approach to our positions and were hit by fire from FPV drones. One of the cars was destroyed, the other was damaged, he said. Despite heavy losses of the occupiers, they do not stop trying to storm in the future, which indicates the importance of the Kharkiv direction for the Russian military and political leadership. In order to continue the offensive, the invaders are trying to change tactics and approaches to carrying out combat missions. On the other hand, the Russians are not sending any significant reinforcements to Kharkiv region and are forced to storm with available forces. — The enemy conducts constant rotations, accumulates forces that carry out assaults in the city itself. He rotates these units internally and is constantly trying to strengthen them. As for any global accumulation, it is currently not observed either in the direction of Vovchansk or near other settlements, in particular Hlyboky, Lyptsi or other locations on the Russian-Ukrainian border, the spokesman said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that ->in Kharkiv Oblast, Ukrainian drones put the occupiers on starvation rations.

Title: The Ministry of Defense is launching a functional audit to improve transparency and efficiency
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. The memorandum was signed by the Minister of Defense Rustem Umyerov and the head of the auditing company. According to the agreements, the audit will cover the ministry's internal work processes, including the activities of the defense minister and his deputies. After the audit is completed, the company will provide detailed recommendations for optimizing and improving work processes. -Increasing the level of transparency and efficiency of the Ministry of Defense is one of our priorities. A functional audit is an important step that will allow identifying areas for improvement and reducing corruption risks. There can be no compromises in ensuring the country's defense capability. Efficiency and trust in our work are key elements on the way to strengthening our defense,- said Defense Minister Rustem Umyerov. This audit is part of the Ministry of Defense's strategic course to strengthen the department's transparency and accountability, which meets international management standards. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense involves non-governmental organizations to discuss the strategy of the digital transformation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

Title: As a border guard - Schumacher - overtook enemy drones on bends
Description: About Andrii with the call sign -Malyuk- said on September 13 on the website of the State Border Service. The first rotation of -Malyuk- — to the combat zone in the Kharkiv region. There he had to drive various armored and non-armored vehicles, deliver and pick up personnel from positions, transport the wounded, deliver ammunition and necessary property to the soldiers, etc. -With a night vision device, he drove at a speed of 120-130 km per hour at night. When the enemy FPV drones started to fly, it was even necessary to drive at a higher speed so that they did not catch up,- -Malyuk- recalls. Adrenaline, says the border guard, was over the top. However, they went to any challenge. And if at full speed in the dark they flew into ravines from enemy anti-tank vehicles and shells, then they simply pulled out the car, repaired it and drove on. Previously ArmyInform told about 43-year-old Serhiy, a soldier of the 78th separate airborne assault regiment and his experience of brutal battles in the Toretsk direction.

Title: President of Ukraine: We need long-range capability to change the course of the war
Description: He emphasized this during a speech within the XX meeting of the Yalta European Strategy. The head of state noted that while Ukraine is waiting for the delivery of promised air defense systems, primarily Patriot, from partners, Russia continues to strike our country. After all, the Russian dictator does not need any long-range permits for this. -Anyone who simply sees on the map where Russia strikes from, where it prepares forces and keeps reserves, where it locates military facilities and what logistics it uses - anyone who sees all this obviously understands what long-range Ukraine is for,- - the President emphasized. Volodymyr Zelensky also noted that the other day he discussed this in detail with US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken and British Foreign Minister David Lammy. According to the words of the Head of State, after this meeting, there can no longer be any open question about why Ukraine needs sufficient long-range. -I want to emphasize: enough. Not enough to simply say that there is a solution. Long-range enough to change the course of the war and force Russia to seek peace. And we very much hope for our partners, we hope for the result from our partners. At least we are working on it,- added Volodymyr Zelenskyi. As reported by ArmyInform, the EU will send interest from frozen Russian assets to strengthen Ukraine's defense.

Title: The third recruiting center of the Ukrainian army opened in Sumy Oblast in a week
Description: About this informs on September 13, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. Consultation can also be obtained by phone: +38(068) 982 6911 and +38(095) 578 6652. The recruiting center is open from Monday to Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:15 p.m., and on Friday from 8:00 a.m. to 16:00. -I thank the Ministry of Defense for this initiative, which has found wide support in our communities and local self-government bodies. This makes it possible to attract precisely motivated personnel to the Armed Forces of Ukraine, which is a key factor for strengthening the combat capability of our army,- said Volodymyr Artyukh, head of the Sumy OVA. The database of Ukrainian army recruiting centers has more than 10,000 vacancies in the Defense Forces. These are drivers, grenade launchers, medics, UAV operators, psychologists, lawyers, clerks and others. Civilian recruiters control every stage of joining the army. -I call on all residents of the region, city and communities to visit these centers. Our recruiters are ready to meet you, explain the process in detail, talk about all the nuances and accompany you at every stage - up to the assignment to a specific military unit,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Defense on recruiting issues. Detailed contact information can be obtained at: https://recruiting.mod.gov.ua/. As reported ArmyInform, the third recruiting center of the Ukrainian army opened in Sumy Oblast in Okhtyrka.

Title: Without food and water in the trenches: the drones put the occupiers on starvation rations
Description: reported who and how exactly deprived the occupiers of the basic necessities for conducting hostilities, on the broadcast of the -Suspilne Novosti- marathon spokesman of OTU -Kharkiv- Vitaly Sarantsev. -Such simple problems have serious consequences for the enemy, because those units that are in advanced positions cannot carry out their tasks efficiently, cannot go on assaults, cannot carry out tasks related to the engineering equipment of their positions,- he said. The lack of an established stable supply of provisions, water and, in some cases, even ammunition has a negative impact on the combat capability of enemy units. Such a situation was created thanks to the skilful combat work of Ukrainian drones, which broke the logistical chains of support in the enemy's near rear. — The prerequisite for this is the effective actions of our FPV drone operators, who skillfully search for the enemy's movement routes and cut all the logistics chains as precisely and accurately as possible. They destroy everything that approaches the positions, no matter how the enemy tries to carry out these support tasks either on foot, using motorized vehicles, or using cars, the spokesman said. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that in Kharkiv Oblast, the occupiers suffer from Ukrainian drones.

Title: Only the resets are whistling outside the window - the night hunting of presidential drones
Description: The video appeared on September 13 on the unit's channel. -The night was not peaceful. Orcs tried to advance towards our positions and launch an assault. But our soldiers do not sleep either. -Untangled- on the approach!-, the unit commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, powerful footage of the mass destruction of enemy attack aircraft made by fighters of the 4th mechanized battalion of the Presidential Brigade named after Hetman Bohdan Khmelnytskyi .

Title: Free pallia: no money was earned, only a suspicion of 10 years in prison
Description: The Security Service of Ukraine informs about this. -This time, the occupiers remotely involved two Odesa residents, an immigrant from Luhansk region and a resident of Izmail district, before committing arson. Among them are three minors. All of them were looking for -easy money- in Telegram channels, where they got into the field of view of the special services of the Russian Federation, -said SBU employees. In order to carry out enemy tasks, the participants at various times found potential -targets- and then coordinated them with their Russian supervisors. After the arsons, the attackers recorded the fire on the cameras of their own phones and sent a -video report- to representatives of the Russian special services. According to such an algorithm, the perpetrators destroyed 6 official cars of Ukrainian defenders, but never received the promised money from the occupiers. Criminals were arrested -on hot pursuit- in various districts of Odesa. During the searches of the homes of the detainees, incendiary devices and mobile phones with evidence of subversive activities for the benefit of the Russian Federation were seized. Investigators of the Security Service informed the detainees (according to the crimes committed) of suspicion under the following articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: The perpetrators are in custody. They face 8 to 10 years in prison. As reported by ArmyInform , an FSB agent set Ukrzaliznytsia facilities on fire and pointed Russian missiles at Chernihiv.

Title: Death at a distance — a hunter-sniper hit the occupier from almost 1,100 meters away
Description: The video of the hit appeared on September 13 on the brigade channel. -The sniper shot the enemy 1094 meters away. Fear the occupiers!-, the brigade commented on the video. As reported by ArmyInform, tank 68 of the Oleksa Dovbush hunting brigade made a bold attack and, despite the enemy artillery fire, accomplished the task.

Title: Finland will provide a new aid package to Ukraine for €118 million
Description: This is reported by the Ministry of Defense of Finland. The department noted that this is already the 25th package of defense aid to Ukraine. The cost of the new batch is estimated at approximately €118 million. In total, Finland has already provided defense aid to Ukraine in the total amount of €2.3 billion. -The military situation in Ukraine remains serious. As promised, Finland will continue to provide material assistance. Our message to partner countries is that we must not give up,- Defense Minister Antti Häkkiänen emphasized. For security reasons, information about the content of the aid, the methods of its delivery and the delivery schedule are not disclosed. It is noted that both the needs of Ukraine and the resources of the Finnish army were taken into account when making the decision to provide additional assistance. As reported by ArmyInform, Anthony Blinken announced the allocation of more than 700 million dollars of new aid to continue supporting Ukraine in the fight against Russian aggression.

Title: 49 soldiers and civilians returned home from Russian captivity, including the Hero of Ukraine
Description: This stated President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy. He noted that these are soldiers of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, the National Guard, the National Police, the State Border Guard Service, as well as our civilians. In particular, Leniye Umerova is a girl who was taken hostage by the Russians when she came to take care of her sick father. It was also possible to free another part of the defenders of Azovstal. Hero of Ukraine, military medic Viktor Ivchuk is also at home. -I thank our entire team, which ensures the release of prisoners and hostages from Russian captivity. And I would like to single out each of our Ukrainian units that replenish the exchange fund for our state,- Volodymyr Zelenskyi noted. The head of state emphasized that all our soldiers who capture the Russian occupier, all our services that neutralize Russian saboteurs and collaborators bring the release of our people closer. -We have to bring home all our soldiers and civilians,- Volodymyr Zelenskyy summed up. As reported by ArmyInform, Ukraine returned 90 defenders from Russian captivity.

Title: More than 45,000 soldiers have already been trained: Great Britain will continue to train the Armed ...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informed about this. The UK has so far trained over 45,000 Ukrainian recruits since the start of Russia's illegal full-scale invasion in 2022. -Great Britain will continue to train groups of Ukrainian defenders on British soil as part of the new government's commitment to support Ukraine as long as necessary,- the agency said. The General Staff of the Armed Forces noted that the training, which continues to develop taking into account the knowledge gained on the Ukrainian front, was supposed to end this year, but will now continue at least until the end of 2025. The recruits will join more than 45,000 Ukrainian military personnel who have already been trained as part of Operation Interflex since Russia's illegal invasion in 2022.

Title: Special forces showed footage of an ambush on Russian soldiers in the Kursk region
Description: This is reported by the Special Operations Forces Command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. It is noted that this video was shot in the Kursk region. The SSO also emphasized that this is one of the few opportunities to see from the inside how our combat groups work on enemy territory. -While working in Kurshchyna, soldiers of one of the units of the Special Operations Forces organized an ambush on enemy fighters. As a result of this operation, one Russian soldier was killed and two were wounded,- the report said. The department also added that the combat group of the Ukrainian Armed Forces retreated without losses after completing the task. As reported by ArmyInform, the fighters of the -GRIFON- UAV unit of the 501st Marine Infantry Battalion of the Armed Forces forced to retreat a detachment of attack aircraft that tried to get to our positions.

Title: 218 enemy spy drones were recorded in the South
Description: This was reported by the Defense Forces of Southern Ukraine. In the Dnieper direction, Russian invaders attacked our positions 6 times. They were strongly repulsed, suffered losses and retreated. The enemy launched 1 assault in the Orichivsk direction, but was unsuccessful. The defense forces continue to carry out comprehensive measures to maintain positions. Over the past day, the flight of 218 reconnaissance UAVs was recorded in the operational zone. Last day, the enemy used 261 FPV drones, 6 Lancet-type attack UAVs, dropped 379 fragmentation munitions from UAVs of various modifications. We will remind, in the Black Sea on combat duty there is 1 enemy ship, which is a carrier of Kalibr cruise missiles with a total salvo of up to 4 missiles.

Title: An inspector from Volyn is suspected of facilitating the illegal departure of men abroad
Description: The Special Prosecutor's Office of the Western Region informs about this. According to the investigation, a 26-year-old junior inspector of the border service from Volyn established a channel for the systematic transfer of conscripts to Poland through official checkpoints. It was established that despite the lack of legal grounds for leaving the border, the border guard allowed some men of draft age, whose documents she checked, to leave the country during the war. She did not enter information about such persons into the integrated information and telecommunications system -Hart-1-, so they could cross the state border without hindrance during the war. The law enforcement officers documented the criminal activity of the employee and informed her of the suspicion. The woman faces 3 to 5 years in prison. Procedural management is carried out by the Specialized Prosecutor's Office in the sphere of defense of the Western region. As reported by ArmyInform, the border guard, which illegally transported 162 conscripts abroad, faces up to 7 years in prison.

Title: Overloading and the storm factor: what can paralyze Russian logistics in Crimea
Description: The spokesperson of the Navy of Ukraine, captain of the third rank Dmytro Pletenchuk, told about this on the air of -Suspilne.Novyny-. The main conclusion is that the occupiers have constant technical difficulties with the operation of the -illegal construction-. It cannot be loaded, but the occupants have no other way out. -First of all, this is due to the consequences of fire damage, the enemy cannot load it, but on the other hand, he does not have much choice. The cases of exploitation of car fuel tanks have become more frequent, that is, they have become overturned more. This information is being verified. But it fits into the general picture of the situation that arose due to the lack of ferry connections, which was the main logistical tool for ensuring the grouping both in Crimea itself and in the south of our country,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. Another factor is added to everything else - the spokesman of the Navy of Ukraine states - soon the beginning of the season of storms in the Black Sea. And this will only increase the problems for the crossing, to protect which the Russians are forced to keep in the area. serious air defense forces. As reported by ArmyInform, missile the attack on a grain ship once again showed Russia as a country that disregards international law.

Title: Air strike in Sumy Oblast: civilians were killed, a child was among the injured
Description: informs Sumy OVA about this. According to available information, the enemy dropped anti-aircraft missiles on civilian infrastructure, 4 explosions were recorded. Previously, as a result of shelling, two people died, 6 were injured, including one child. Multi-apartment residential buildings, a hospital were damaged, and there was no electricity supply. All necessary services are available on site. The consequences of the attack are being clarified. As reported by ArmyInform, the enemy carried out an air strike on One explosion was recorded in Okhtyrtsi, using the KAB.

Title: The end of a saboteur's career: a man from Chernihiv who helped destroy his own city was detained
Description: notified the Security Service of Ukraine. The perpetrator adjusted missile strikes on the regional center and prepared a series of arsons at Ukrzaliznytsia facilities. The priority targets of the enemy shelling were the base points of the Ukrainian troops involved in the defense of the northern borders of Ukraine. According to available data, the occupiers planned to use Kh-59 air missiles to carry out fire damage. The Russian special service also tried to find out the locations of enterprises that fulfill a state defense order. To perform these tasks, the FSB remotely recruited a 44-year-old employee of a local factory. -The man came to the attention of the Russian special services because of his anti-Ukrainian comments in Telegram channels. According to the instructions of the occupiers, the figure went around the area, where he secretly recorded the location of the Defense Forces. He forwarded the information he received to his Russian curator via messenger via a specially created chatbot administered by the FSB,- SBU employees said. In addition, the agent -hunted- for relay cabinets of railway connections in the region. It was documented that the suspect set fire to the technological equipment near the main track with a flammable mixture. During the search of the premises of the detainee and his relatives, 8 combat grenades, ammunition of various calibers and a telephone with evidence of subversive activities for the benefit of the Russian Federation were seized. -Investigators of the Security Service informed him of suspicion under two articles of the Criminal Code of Ukraine: Part 2 of Art. 111 (treason committed under martial law); Part 2 Art. 113 (sabotage committed under martial law),- the statement said. The perpetrator is in custody. He faces up to life in prison with forfeiture of property. As reported /a> ArmyInform earlier, according to SBU materials, an FSB agent who coordinated missile strikes on Zaporozhye was sentenced to 15 years in prison.

Title: 16 tanks, 40 BBM and more than 1,000 infantrymen: Russian losses in the East
Description: informs OSUV -Khortytsia- on its official Telegram channel -Khortytsky Wind-. As noted, the Defense Forces continue to inflict losses on the enemy in manpower and equipment. In particular, in this direction, Russian losses per day are: Also, our soldiers destroyed 89 shelters and 13 enemy ammunition depots. Title: -Sarayami- according to the Donetsk scenario: what makes Russians submissively -canned in cans-
Description: The battalion commander told about the peculiarities of storming -barracks- according to the Donetsk scenario on the air of the national telethon -Edyny Novyny- of shock air defense systems -Achilles- of the 92nd separate assault brigade named after the basket chieftain Ivan Sirk, captain Yury Fedorenko. — The first armored vehicle that goes in their assault column is mostly an old modification tank, roughly like the T-72. It can be without a tower, without ammunition. It is used precisely as a carrier. From above, it is actually covered with a -barn-. Anyone who has ever seen a barn or an old house knows how it will look made of metal, said the drone commander. In front of this armored vehicle are trawls designed to remove mine barriers, both anti-personnel and anti-tank. — Between the body of the tank and between this -barn-, which is welded on top, there is an assault infantry. Behind the tank, 2-3 BMPs are moving, similarly covered with -sheds- on top. Between the body of the BMP and this very -barn- is the assault infantry, the soldier continued. It is difficult to understand why the Russians meekly accept certain death. — Frankly speaking, I do not know what the Russian occupiers are telling the military and how they are forcing them to climb into this structure that is being built, because it is certain death. Most of the conscious people who are involved in the military affairs understand this, including new recruits of the Russian Federation. But the system of coercion in them works perfectly and the occupier is more afraid of his own than going to the battlefield to certain death. Therefore, one way or another, they are -preserved- in this -can-, said Yuriy Fedorenko. Next, assault actions take place - Russian -barracks- rush in the direction of the positions of the units of the Defense Forces. — At high speed, the main task is to jump to our advanced positions. -Tanchyk makes a pass and BMPs fly behind him to rush the infantry and then move on to shock-assault actions with the aim of displacing us from advanced positions,- said the commander of -Achilles-. The military said that drones saw such sheds for the first time in Donetsk region. There, they were used most in the Avdiivka region, in the Bakhmut area and in other places. Losses among the personnel of the enemy during such assaults are colossal. — 90% of vehicles are currently destroyed by Defense Forces on the battlefield either immediately or after damage. Up to 60-70% of the assault infantry, which moves on such equipment, does not reach the line of advance, Yuriy Fedorenko said. The military said that during the past day, Achilles fighters managed to destroy 4 units of armored vehicles - one tank and 3 BMP. In general, even more enemy equipment was burned on the field, because the gunners and drones of other units also worked well on it. Since the beginning of September, the -Achillesians- have already destroyed 25 units of the occupiers' equipment. However, the droners are in no hurry to relax - the occupants still have enough -dances- and -beh- left. -This indicates that the enemy still has the opportunity, unfortunately, to carry out shock-assault actions and deploy its lightly armored and armored vehicles,- noted Yuriy Fedorenko. Earlier, ArmyInform showed how the long-range -helmeted- Achilles - hit exactly under the turret of a Russian tank and defeated -Grad - in Belgorod region, and the all-seeing -Achilles- saw and eliminated the occupiers and shot a full yagdtash of enemy equipment in Kharkiv Oblast.

Title: In Kharkiv, the evader received a real prison term
Description: Kharkiv Regional Prosecutor's Office informs about this. Prosecutors proved that in December 2023, the man received a summons to arrive at the Kyiv District Territorial Center of Recruitment and Social Support of the city of Kharkiv. A resident of Kharkiv was duly informed of the consequences of refusing to be called up and undergo military service during the mobilization announced by the Decree of the President of Ukraine. According to Part 3 of Art. 22 of the Law of Ukraine -On Mobilization Training and Mobilization-, during mobilization, citizens are required to report to military units or assembly points of the territorial center of recruitment and social support within the time limits specified in the received documents. However, the man did not arrive at the Kyiv district TCC and SP, being suitable for military service in accordance with the decision of the VLK. During the trial, the accused pleaded not guilty, justifying himself with different versions. The guilty verdict was handed down by the Kyiv District Court of Kharkiv. There is currently an appeal period. As reported by ArmyInform, a former official in Volyn organized the escape of evaders for $5 thousand.

Title: The fourth in Sumy Oblast: a recruiting center for the Ukrainian army was opened in Konotop
Description: informs about this Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. From now on, you can get all the necessary information and be recruited at the address: Chervonoi Kalina Avenue, 13, in the premises of the Center for National Health and Welfare, or by phone: +38 (098) 091 7383. The center is open on Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays from 8:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. and on Tuesday and Thursday from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. As of September 13, a total of 36 recruiting centers of the Ukrainian army are operating in Ukraine. -I call on all residents of the city: come to the recruitment center so that after the Victory you will have a clear conscience, have something to tell your children and make your parents proud of you. Here you can choose the specialty that suits you completely and go to serve where you want. So come!- Artem Semenikhin, the mayor of Konotop, emphasized. Persons from 18 to 60 years old can be recruited. For doctors, psychologists and people aged 18 to 25, a 1-year contract is provided. -More than 16,000 people have already applied to the network of recruiting centers of the Ukrainian army. Thousands of people join the Defense Forces as volunteers every month and the number is constantly growing. Sumy region shows good results. Therefore, I urge all those who wish to contact our specially trained civilian recruiters and choose a military unit and a position in the army,- said Oleksiy Bezhevets, the authorized representative of the Ministry of Defense on recruiting issues. Detailed information on the addresses and work schedule of the Ukrainian army recruiting centers can be found at: https://recruiting .mod.gov.ua/.

Title: Latest pirates: Russians strike civilian ships with strategic aircraft
Description: About this on September 13 on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novy- marathon, commenting on the rocket attack by the Russians on a ship transporting grain to Egypt, said the spokesman of the Navy of Ukraine Dmytro Pletenchuk. -This did not happen in the area of ​​our control, not in the maritime corridor. The ship left it and went on a different route. As for the qualification of these actions, Russia has once again shown itself to be a country that disregards international law and allows itself to strike civilian objects. The case that took place is, of course, international level, it concerns not only our country,- said Dmytro Pletenchuk. Dmytro Pletenchuk noted that the use of a TU-22 bomber against a peaceful vessel of strategic aviation is particularly shocking. -The level of use of weapons raises many questions. To use weapons, which I tentatively call 50 by 50. These missiles are 50 years old from the moment of their use, and for these missiles to deviate by 50 kilometers is a normal phenomenon. Therefore, these are absolutely irresponsible actions.- - stated the spokesman of the Navy of Ukraine. As reported by ArmyInform , ships that help the Russians plunder the occupied territories of Ukraine are already being detained

Title: Another scalp of Ukrainian cyber-activists: 1.5 million electronic digital signatures were stolen in...

The company is represented by more than 140 branches, i.e. call Russian Federation As reported by ArmyInform , September 11 The state rear operator presented DOT-Chain, an innovative IT system for managing the rear needs of the Armed Forces.

Title: They desert alone so as not to die together: in the Kharkiv region, the occupiers are fleeing their ...

The occupiers fired at the positions of the Defense Forces of Ukraine 394 times. The defense forces of Ukraine adequately respond to the actions and continue to destroy the manpower, weapons and military equipment of the Russian occupiers. The enemy's losses over the past day amounted to 73 creatures, of which 30 were irreversible, 43 sanitary. Also, in our direction the enemy lost destroyed and damaged 66 units of weapons and military equipment, in particular : Also in the Kharkiv direction, the Defense Forces destroyed 38 shelters for personnel, 2 ammunition storage sites, and 2 UAV launch sites. Title: Since the beginning of the day, the military has recorded more than 400 shelling of positions in the...
Description: informs OSUV -Khortytsia- on its official Telegram channel -Khortytskyi Wind-. In addition, the enemy army continues to shell the positions of our defenders. -In the current day alone, 3 airstrikes (with the dropping of 5 anti-aircraft missiles), 407 shellings and 15 strikes by kamikaze drones have already been recorded in the area of ​​responsibility of the Khortytsia air defense system,- the military said. As reported by ArmyInform, more than 140 assaults per day: our warriors hold the defense along the entire front line.

Title: The EU will direct interest from frozen Russian assets to strengthen Ukraine's defense
Description: About this informs the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. -Ukraine thanks the EU for the decision to direct interest from frozen Russian assets to Ukraine's defense needs. These funds should become a powerful tool for strengthening the country's defense capabilities in the face of a large-scale war. The Ministry of Defense plans to use these funds to purchase the necessary resources and means of protection that will help strengthen national security,- Dmytro Klimenkov said during the meeting. In the summer of 2024, the EU decided to send the first tranche of 1.5 billion euros to Ukraine. Thanks to part of these funds, Ukraine plans, in particular, to purchase ammunition and air defense equipment. This will significantly increase the firepower of the Armed Forces and significantly increase their ability to protect Ukrainian skies from enemy attacks. Negotiations are also underway regarding the possibility of allocating part of the funds to the purchase of weapons from Ukrainian manufacturers. -We are working with our international partners to receive the next tranche of interest from frozen Russian assets in 2025. The Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has already developed the necessary procedures to direct these resources to the purchase of weapons,- noted Hlib Kanevskyi, director of the procurement policy department of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine. He also added that their key priorities remain unchanged: the supply of ammunition, air defense equipment, and drones. Ukraine expects to increase the share of these percentages, which will be directed to purchases from Ukrainian manufacturers. This EU financial support is another important step in the joint efforts of the international community to counter Russian aggression. It will not only allow Ukraine to strengthen its defense positions, but also support the Ukrainian defense-industrial complex. As reported by ArmyInform, the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine initiated the development of technical and functional requirements for turnstiles, in accordance with modern NATO standards in the field of providing pre-medical care on the battlefield.

Title: In the Zaporizhzhia region, a pensioner was attacked by occupiers in her own yard
Description: This was reported by Ivan Fedorov, the head of Zaporizhzhya OVA. According to him, a 67-year-old woman received shrapnel wounds to her left shoulder as a result of the Mala Tokmachka artillery fire. -The rescuers of the State Emergency Service provided the woman with first-aid and transported her to the Zaporizhzhia Regional Clinical Hospital,- noted Ivan Fedorov. Title: Air defense forces eliminated 24 martyrs in five regions of Ukraine

Title: Russians shot at civilians in the Kharkiv region: 4 people died, 19 were injured
Description: informed Oleg Synegubov, the head of Kharkiv OVA, gave a detailed account of the consequences of shelling in Kharkiv Oblast last day. A 64-year-old woman died in Borova of Izyum district as a result of the first shelling around 12:45, and the roof of the shop was on fire as a result of the shelling. The Russians hit Borova again around 1:00 p.m. As a result of another criminal attack, 3 people were killed and 10 others were injured, including 3 rescuers. 4 private houses, three outbuildings, and a garage were destroyed. Later, around midnight, the third Russian shelling in a day caused a fire in the Borova ecosystem: grass burned on an area of ​​400 square meters. In Kharkiv, 5 people were injured as a result of enemy airstrikes: three women aged 39, 70, 83, a 33-year-old man and a 10-year-old girl who has an acute reaction to stress. 2 private houses and 1 non-residential building were damaged. In Dergachy, 3 people were injured as a result of shelling by KAB - two women aged 65 and 54, as well as a 31-year-old man. Also, in the village of Morozova Dolyna of the Zolochiv community of the Bogodukhiv district, a 54-year-old man was injured and a car was damaged as a result of an FPV drone strike. In the region, the Russian occupiers also intensively shelled the Kupyan region. In the city of Kupyansk, a club and a civilian building burned down as a result of an enemy strike. In the villages of Novoosynove and Glushkivka, houses and farm buildings were destroyed, and there were fires in ecosystems. The invaders also shelled the village of Biliy Kolodyaz of the Vovchanska community of the Chuguyiv district, where an economic building was on fire. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that occupiers targeted employees of the National Security Service in Borova during a rescue operation, and also about the victims of the Russian airstrike on Kharkiv and the suburbs.

Title: Forum for the development of EW: Ukrainian manufacturers presented the latest developments for the f...
Description: The General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine informs about this. Representatives of the Armed Forces, the Ministry of Defense, relevant ministries and companies producing EW systems took part in the event, which was launched in accordance with the decision of the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. -The direction of radio-electronic warfare is one of the priority tasks for the military today,- Lieutenant General Anatoliy Barhylevych, chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, said in his speech via closed video conference. He added that we must do everything necessary to develop EW technologies as soon as possible, taking into account the range of use of its means by the enemy. According to the forum participants, it is important to speed up the development of samples, standardize and simplify the codification procedure. Scaling up the production of EW systems, training servicemen to use them effectively are the main tasks at the moment. -It is hard to imagine a battlefield without EW devices now,- noted the Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Andriy Lebedenko. -In the realities of modern warfare, the number of hits by drones is on the same level as artillery.- The number of applications of UAVs is growing every month, as is the number of their modifications. Today, damage by drones reaches 60%. Therefore, the development of EW systems, their maximum efficiency and their supply to the troops in sufficient quantity is an issue that requires an urgent solution. Effective EW on the battlefield is, first of all, the preservation of the lives of Ukrainian soldiers, therefore the Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine identified the development of EW systems as one of the key priorities. Currently, we have three ways of developing EW: improvement of existing weapons, introduction of EW equipment provided by foreign partners and introduction of qualitatively new EW equipment of our own production. Therefore, our goal today is to discuss all problems, hear from manufacturers, colleagues from the Ministry of Digital Transformation of Ukraine, the Ministry of Strategic Industries of Ukraine and obtain effective algorithms for improving EW tools, - emphasized the Deputy Commander-in-Chief of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. The head of the Department of Innovation of the Armed Forces of Ukraine, Colonel Vitaly Dobryansky, emphasized that the existing system of support for domestic manufacturers at the stages of development and codification of EW systems requires special attention. Currently, a system of testing the latest samples is organized and functioning. We are also forming experimental combat units to conduct such tests in combat conditions, the conclusions of which will greatly simplify the codification of products. According to Oleksandr Bornyakov, Deputy Minister of Digital Transformation of Ukraine for IT Development, the number of samples of radio electronic warfare has now increased significantly. -We started with ten to fifteen developments, now we have about two hundred,- he emphasized. During the forum, manufacturers of electronic warfare systems had the opportunity not only to share their vision for the development of the industry, but also to present some of the latest developments. According to representatives of the manufacturing companies, all systems have been successfully tested and are currently working effectively at the front. As reported by ArmyInform, on the sidelines of the MSPO International Specialized Weapons Exhibition, which was recently held in Poland, -ugody-pro-spivpraczyu-v-sferi-ozbroyennya/->several measures aimed at strengthening Ukraine's defense capabilities took place.

Title: A moment of silence in Ukraine
Description: -In order to honor the bright memory, civic courage and self-sacrifice, strength of spirit, resilience and heroic deed of the soldiers who fell during the execution of combat missions to protect the state sovereignty and territorial integrity of Ukraine, civilians who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine , I decree: to start holding a nationwide minute of silence every day at 9:00 a.m. for compatriots who died as a result of the armed aggression of the Russian Federation against Ukraine, to be announced in all mass media regardless of the form of ownership,- the document says.

Title: Enemy saboteurs in Sumy Oblast are detected by drones: what do the DRGs do?
Description: told about this on the broadcast of the -Edyny Novy- marathon spokesman of the State Border Service of Ukraine Andrii Demchenko. — Although the activity has decreased, the enemy's subversive activities have not completely disappeared. Therefore, our soldiers continue to act actively and jointly together in order to expose the attempts of enemy sabotage and intelligence groups to enter with any purpose. For this, we use unmanned aerial vehicles, as well as other technical means of terrain control, he said. In general, the activity of Russian saboteurs in the border zone in the Sumy region has significantly decreased compared to previous periods before the start of the Kursk offensive operation. If earlier enemy saboteurs engaged in battle with Ukrainian defenders, tried to inflict fire damage or even capture positions, now they focused on attempts to detonate the area. -Saboteurs are trying to enter our territory, especially to take certain actions in order to mine the area, but not to engage in fire activity,- said Andriy Demchenko. He noted that the Russian DRGs are afraid of encountering active opposition from the units of the Defense Forces and that is why they have reduced their activity, avoid detection at all costs and have given up attempts to proactively enter the battle. Earlier, ArmyInform reported that Defense Forces forced the enemy to practically abandon the use of DRG in Sumshchyna, therefore minuvanni-misczevosti/->Russian saboteurs on the northern border focused on mining the area. Instead, thanks to the Kursk operation, Ukrainian defenders are able to significantly strengthen border protection in Sumshchyna /a>.

Title: 10 injured and one dead — consequences of Russian strikes in the Kherson region

The aggressor carried out airstrikes, in particular in the areas of the settlements of Pavlivka, Myronivka, Obody, Richki, Maryine, Bilopylla, Berestovka, Fedorivka, Toretsk, Ivanopilla, Dobropilla, Ocheretyne, Pokrovsk, Vugledar, Urozhane, Novodonetske, Novoukrainka, Pavlivske, Novopokrovka, Kam Yanske, Stepnohirsk, Shcherbaki and Odradokamianka. Also, the enemy's aircraft made two strikes with five anti-aircraft missiles on civilian infrastructure. In the Kupyansk direction, there were eight attacks by the occupiers during the day. The defense forces repelled enemy assaults near Synkivka, Hlushkivka, Kolisnikivka, Stelmakhivka, and Lozova. In the Lyman direction the enemy attacked six times. Tried to move forward towards Nevsky and Druzhelyubivka. In the Seversky direction, Ukrainian defenders repelled five assaults by Russian invaders near Verkhnokamyanskyi. Enemy aircraft attacked the village of Fedorivka with ten unguided air missiles. In the Kramatorsk direction, the occupiers attacked four times in the areas of Chasovoy Yar and the settlement of Stupochka. In the direction of Toretsk the enemy, with the support of aviation, carried out six attacks near Nelipivka, Toretsk and in the New York area. In the Pokrovsky direction our defenders stopped 36 assault and offensive actions of the aggressor in the direction of Vozdvizhenka, Novooleksandrivka, Zeleny Pol, Novotroitsky, Grodivka, Novogrodivka, Selidovoy, and Mykhailivka. The greatest concentration of enemy attacks was in the districts of Grodivka and Novogrodivka. On the Kurakhiv direction, the defense forces repelled 64 attacks. The occupiers most actively tried to advance in the regions of the settlements of Kostyantynivka and Georgiivka, where about 75 percent of all battles took place. In addition, the enemy attacked in the direction of Alexandropol and Zhelany the First. In the Vremivsk direction the enemy carried out five assaults on our positions in the Vodyanyi and Zolotai Niva areas. Actively used for strikes in the direction of attack and bomber aircraft. In the Orykhiv direction, the occupiers attacked in the Robotyny area, and also carried out airstrikes on Kamiansk, Stepnohirsk, and Shcherbaki. In the Dnieper direction Russian invaders attacked our positions six times. They were repulsed and suffered losses. In the Volyn and Poliske directions no signs of the formation of enemy offensive groups were detected. We will remind you that last The loss of the Russian invaders amounted to 1,220 people. Also, Ukrainian soldiers destroyed 18 tanks, 48 ​​armored combat vehicles, 52 artillery systems, one MLRS, 80 operational-tactical UAVs, 79 vehicles and 10 units of special equipment of the occupiers.
